│ │ -00001a40: 7465 7266 6163 6520 7468 6174 2063 6f6e  terface that con
│ │ -00001a50: 7469 6e75 6f75 736c 7920 7570 6461 7465  tinuously update
│ │ -00001a60: 7320 7468 6520 7374 6174 7573 206f 6620  s the status of 
│ │ -00001a70: 7468 6520 6465 7669 6365 7320 616e 6420  the devices and 
│ │ -00001a80: 7072 6f63 6573 7365 732e 2041 7320 6120  processes. As a 
│ │ -00001a90: 7265 736f 7572 6365 206d 6f6e 6974 6f72  resource monitor
│ │ -00001aa0: 2c20 6974 2069 6e63 6c75 6465 7320 6d61  , it includes ma
│ │ -00001ab0: 6e79 2066 6561 7475 7265 7320 616e 6420  ny features and 
│ │ -00001ac0: 6f70 7469 6f6e 732c 2073 7563 6820 6173  options, such as
│ │ -00001ad0: 2074 7265 652d 7669 6577 2c20 656e 7669   tree-view, envi
│ │ -00001ae0: 726f 6e6d 656e 7420 7661 7269 6162 6c65  ronment variable
│ │ -00001af0: 2076 6965 7769 6e67 2c20 7072 6f63 6573   viewing, proces
│ │ -00001b00: 7320 6669 6c74 6572 696e 672c 2070 726f  s filtering, pro
│ │ -00001b10: 6365 7373 206d 6574 7269 6373 206d 6f6e  cess metrics mon
│ │ -00001b20: 6974 6f72 696e 672c 2065 7463 2e20 4265  itoring, etc. Be
│ │ -00001b30: 796f 6e64 2074 6861 742c 2074 6865 2070  yond that, the p
│ │ -00001b40: 6163 6b61 6765 2061 6c73 6f20 7368 6970  ackage also ship
│ │ -00001b50: 7320 6120 5b43 5544 4120 6465 7669 6365  s a [CUDA device
│ │ -00001b60: 2073 656c 6563 7469 6f6e 2074 6f6f 6c20   selection tool 
│ │ -00001b70: 606e 7669 7365 6c60 5d28 2363 7564 612d  `nvisel`](#cuda-

│ │ -00001bb0: 6720 7265 7365 6172 6368 6572 732e 2049  g researchers. I

│ │ -00002800: 0a0a 2a2a 4e4f 5445 3a2a 2a20 5468 6520  ..**NOTE:** The 
│ │ -00002810: 5b4e 5649 4449 4120 4d61 6e61 6765 6d65  [NVIDIA Manageme
│ │ -00002820: 6e74 204c 6962 7261 7279 2028 2a4e 564d  nt Library (*NVM
│ │ -00002830: 4c2a 295d 2868 7474 7073 3a2f 2f64 6576  L*)](https://dev
│ │ -00002840: 656c 6f70 6572 2e6e 7669 6469 612e 636f  eloper.nvidia.co

│ │ -00002880: 726f 6772 616d 6d61 7469 6320 696e 7465  rogrammatic inte
│ │ -00002890: 7266 6163 6520 666f 7220 6d6f 6e69 746f  rface for monito

│ │ -000028b0: 6720 7661 7269 6f75 7320 7374 6174 6573  g various states
│ │ -000028c0: 2e20 5468 6520 7275 6e74 696d 6520 7665  . The runtime ve
│ │ -000028d0: 7273 696f 6e20 6f66 204e 564d 4c20 6c69  rsion of NVML li

│ │ -000028f0: 2074 6865 204e 5649 4449 4120 6469 7370   the NVIDIA disp

│ │ -00002960: 292c 206f 7220 6361 6e20 6265 2064 6f77  ), or can be dow

│ │ -000035d0: 0a0a 2320 5370 6563 6966 7920 7175 6572  ..# Specify quer

│ │ -000036f0: 6060 0a0a 5768 656e 2074 6865 2060 2d31  ``..When the `-1

│ │ -00003780: 6e64 2068 6173 206c 6f77 6572 2072 6573  nd has lower res

│ │ -000037a0: 205b 436f 6d6d 616e 6420 4c69 6e65 204f   [Command Line O

│ │ -00003800: 732e 0a0a 5468 6572 6520 6973 2061 6c73  s...There is als

│ │ +000019e0: 0a2d 2d2d 2d2d 2d0a 0a60 6e76 6974 6f70  .------..`nvitop
│ │ +000019f0: 6020 6973 2061 6e20 696e 7465 7261 6374  ` is an interact
│ │ +00001a00: 6976 6520 4e56 4944 4941 2064 6576 6963  ive NVIDIA devic
│ │ +00001a10: 6520 616e 6420 7072 6f63 6573 7320 6d6f  e and process mo
│ │ +00001a20: 6e69 746f 7269 6e67 2074 6f6f 6c2e 2049  nitoring tool. I
│ │ +00001a30: 7420 6861 7320 6120 636f 6c6f 7266 756c  t has a colorful
│ │ +00001a40: 2061 6e64 2069 6e66 6f72 6d61 7469 7665   and informative
│ │ +00001a50: 2069 6e74 6572 6661 6365 2074 6861 7420   interface that 
│ │ +00001a60: 636f 6e74 696e 756f 7573 6c79 2075 7064  continuously upd
│ │ +00001a70: 6174 6573 2074 6865 2073 7461 7475 7320  ates the status 
│ │ +00001a80: 6f66 2074 6865 2064 6576 6963 6573 2061  of the devices a
│ │ +00001a90: 6e64 2070 726f 6365 7373 6573 2e20 4173  nd processes. As
│ │ +00001aa0: 2061 2072 6573 6f75 7263 6520 6d6f 6e69   a resource moni
│ │ +00001ab0: 746f 722c 2069 7420 696e 636c 7564 6573  tor, it includes
│ │ +00001ac0: 206d 616e 7920 6665 6174 7572 6573 2061   many features a
│ │ +00001ad0: 6e64 206f 7074 696f 6e73 2c20 7375 6368  nd options, such
│ │ +00001ae0: 2061 7320 7472 6565 2d76 6965 772c 2065   as tree-view, e
│ │ +00001af0: 6e76 6972 6f6e 6d65 6e74 2076 6172 6961  nvironment varia
│ │ +00001b00: 626c 6520 7669 6577 696e 672c 2070 726f  ble viewing, pro
│ │ +00001b10: 6365 7373 2066 696c 7465 7269 6e67 2c20  cess filtering, 
│ │ +00001b20: 7072 6f63 6573 7320 6d65 7472 6963 7320  process metrics 
│ │ +00001b30: 6d6f 6e69 746f 7269 6e67 2c20 6574 632e  monitoring, etc.
│ │ +00001b40: 2042 6579 6f6e 6420 7468 6174 2c20 7468   Beyond that, th
│ │ +00001b50: 6520 7061 636b 6167 6520 616c 736f 2073  e package also s
│ │ +00001b60: 6869 7073 2061 205b 4355 4441 2064 6576  hips a [CUDA dev
│ │ +00001b70: 6963 6520 7365 6c65 6374 696f 6e20 746f  ice selection to
│ │ +00001b80: 6f6c 2060 6e76 6973 656c 605d 2823 6375  ol `nvisel`](#cu
│ │ +00001b90: 6461 2d76 6973 6962 6c65 2d64 6576 6963  da-visible-devic
│ │ +00001ba0: 6573 2d73 656c 6563 7469 6f6e 2d74 6f6f  es-selection-too
│ │ +00001bb0: 6c29 2066 6f72 2064 6565 7020 6c65 6172  l) for deep lear
│ │ +00001bc0: 6e69 6e67 2072 6573 6561 7263 6865 7273  ning researchers
│ │ +00001bd0: 2e20 4974 2061 6c73 6f20 7072 6f76 6964  . It also provid
│ │ +00001be0: 6573 2068 616e 6479 2041 5049 7320 7468  es handy APIs th
│ │ +00001bf0: 6174 2061 6c6c 6f77 2064 6576 656c 6f70  at allow develop
│ │ +00001c00: 6572 7320 746f 2077 7269 7465 2074 6865  ers to write the
│ │ +00001c10: 6972 206f 776e 206d 6f6e 6974 6f72 696e  ir own monitorin
│ │ +00001c20: 6720 746f 6f6c 732e 2050 6c65 6173 6520  g tools. Please 
│ │ +00001c30: 7265 6665 7220 746f 2073 6563 7469 6f6e  refer to section
│ │ +00001c40: 205b 4d6f 7265 2074 6861 6e20 6120 4d6f   [More than a Mo
│ │ +00001c50: 6e69 746f 725d 2823 6d6f 7265 2d74 6861  nitor](#more-tha

│ │ +00001c70: 2074 6865 2066 756c 6c20 4150 4920 7265   the full API re
│ │ +00001c80: 6665 7265 6e63 6573 2061 7420 3c68 7474  ferences at <htt

│ │ +00001cc0: 2e0a 0a3c 7020 616c 6967 6e3d 2263 656e  ...<p align="cen

│ │ +00001ce0: 7468 3d22 3130 3025 2220 7372 633d 2268  th="100%" src="h

│ │ +00001e50: 2020 436f 6d70 6172 6520 746f 203c 636f    Compare to <co
│ │ +00001e60: 6465 3e6e 7669 6469 612d 736d 693c 2f63  de>nvidia-smi</c
│ │ +00001e70: 6f64 653e 2e0a 3c2f 703e 0a0a 2d2d 2d2d  ode>..</p>..----
│ │ +00001e80: 2d2d 0a0a 2323 2046 6561 7475 7265 730a  --..## Features.
│ │ +00001e90: 0a2d 202a 2a49 6e66 6f72 6d61 7469 7665  .- **Informative
│ │ +00001ea0: 2061 6e64 2066 616e 6379 206f 7574 7075   and fancy outpu
│ │ +00001eb0: 742a 2a3a 2073 686f 7720 6d6f 7265 2069  t**: show more i
│ │ +00001ec0: 6e66 6f72 6d61 7469 6f6e 2074 6861 6e20  nformation than 
│ │ +00001ed0: 606e 7669 6469 612d 736d 6960 2077 6974  `nvidia-smi` wit
│ │ +00001ee0: 6820 636f 6c6f 7269 7a65 6420 6661 6e63  h colorized fanc
│ │ +00001ef0: 7920 626f 7820 6472 6177 696e 672e 0a2d  y box drawing..-
│ │ +00001f00: 202a 2a4d 6f6e 6974 6f72 206d 6f64 652a   **Monitor mode*
│ │ +00001f10: 2a3a 2063 616e 2072 756e 2061 7320 6120  *: can run as a 
│ │ +00001f20: 7265 736f 7572 6365 206d 6f6e 6974 6f72  resource monitor
│ │ +00001f30: 2c20 7261 7468 6572 2074 6861 6e20 7072  , rather than pr
│ │ +00001f40: 696e 7420 7468 6520 7265 7375 6c74 7320  int the results 
│ │ +00001f50: 6f6e 6c79 206f 6e63 652e 0a20 202d 2062  only once..  - b
│ │ +00001f60: 6172 2063 6861 7274 7320 616e 6420 6869  ar charts and hi
│ │ +00001f70: 7374 6f72 7920 6772 6170 6873 0a20 202d  story graphs.  -
│ │ +00001f80: 2070 726f 6365 7373 2073 6f72 7469 6e67   process sorting
│ │ +00001f90: 0a20 202d 2070 726f 6365 7373 2066 696c  .  - process fil
│ │ +00001fa0: 7465 7269 6e67 0a20 202d 2073 656e 6420  tering.  - send 
│ │ +00001fb0: 7369 676e 616c 7320 746f 2070 726f 6365  signals to proce
│ │ +00001fc0: 7373 6573 2077 6974 6820 6120 6b65 7973  sses with a keys
│ │ +00001fd0: 7472 6f6b 650a 2020 2d20 7472 6565 2d76  troke.  - tree-v
│ │ +00001fe0: 6965 7720 7363 7265 656e 2066 6f72 2047  iew screen for G
│ │ +00001ff0: 5055 2070 726f 6365 7373 6573 2061 6e64  PU processes and
│ │ +00002000: 2074 6865 6972 2070 6172 656e 7420 7072   their parent pr
│ │ +00002010: 6f63 6573 7365 730a 2020 2d20 656e 7669  ocesses.  - envi
│ │ +00002020: 726f 6e6d 656e 7420 7661 7269 6162 6c65  ronment variable
│ │ +00002030: 2073 6372 6565 6e0a 2020 2d20 6865 6c70   screen.  - help
│ │ +00002040: 2073 6372 6565 6e0a 2020 2d20 6d6f 7573   screen.  - mous
│ │ +00002050: 6520 7375 7070 6f72 740a 2d20 2a2a 496e  e support.- **In
│ │ +00002060: 7465 7261 6374 6976 652a 2a3a 2072 6573  teractive**: res
│ │ +00002070: 706f 6e73 6976 6520 666f 7220 7573 6572  ponsive for user
│ │ +00002080: 2069 6e70 7574 2028 6672 6f6d 206b 6579   input (from key
│ │ +00002090: 626f 6172 6420 616e 642f 6f72 206d 6f75  board and/or mou
│ │ +000020a0: 7365 2920 696e 206d 6f6e 6974 6f72 206d  se) in monitor m
│ │ +000020b0: 6f64 652e 2028 7673 2e20 5b67 7075 7374  ode. (vs. [gpust
│ │ +000020c0: 6174 5d28 6874 7470 733a 2f2f 6769 7468  at](https://gith
│ │ +000020d0: 7562 2e63 6f6d 2f77 6f6f 6b61 7969 6e2f  ub.com/wookayin/
│ │ +000020e0: 6770 7573 7461 7429 2026 205b 7079 336e  gpustat) & [py3n
│ │ +000020f0: 766d 6c5d 2868 7474 7073 3a2f 2f67 6974  vml](https://git
│ │ +00002100: 6875 622e 636f 6d2f 6662 636f 7474 6572  hub.com/fbcotter
│ │ +00002110: 2f70 7933 6e76 6d6c 2929 0a2d 202a 2a45  /py3nvml)).- **E
│ │ +00002120: 6666 6963 6965 6e74 2a2a 3a0a 2020 2d20  fficient**:.  - 
│ │ +00002130: 7175 6572 7920 6465 7669 6365 2073 7461  query device sta
│ │ +00002140: 7475 7320 7573 696e 6720 5b2a 4e56 4d4c  tus using [*NVML
│ │ +00002150: 2050 7974 686f 6e20 6269 6e64 696e 6773   Python bindings
│ │ +00002160: 2a5d 2868 7474 7073 3a2f 2f70 7970 692e  *](https://pypi.
│ │ +00002170: 6f72 672f 7072 6f6a 6563 742f 6e76 6964  org/project/nvid
│ │ +00002180: 6961 2d6d 6c2d 7079 2920 6469 7265 6374  ia-ml-py) direct
│ │ +00002190: 6c79 2c20 696e 7374 6561 6420 6f66 2070  ly, instead of p
│ │ +000021a0: 6172 7369 6e67 2074 6865 206f 7574 7075  arsing the outpu
│ │ +000021b0: 7420 6f66 2060 6e76 6964 6961 2d73 6d69  t of `nvidia-smi
│ │ +000021c0: 602e 2028 7673 2e20 5b6e 7669 6469 612d  `. (vs. [nvidia-
│ │ +000021d0: 6874 6f70 5d28 6874 7470 733a 2f2f 6769  htop](https://gi
│ │ +000021e0: 7468 7562 2e63 6f6d 2f70 6563 6931 2f6e  thub.com/peci1/n
│ │ +000021f0: 7669 6469 612d 6874 6f70 2929 0a20 202d  vidia-htop)).  -
│ │ +00002200: 2073 7570 706f 7274 2073 7061 7273 6520   support sparse 
│ │ +00002210: 7175 6572 7920 616e 6420 6361 6368 6520  query and cache 
│ │ +00002220: 7265 7375 6c74 7320 7769 7468 2060 5454  results with `TT
│ │ +00002230: 4c43 6163 6865 6020 6672 6f6d 205b 6361  LCache` from [ca
│ │ +00002240: 6368 6574 6f6f 6c73 5d28 6874 7470 733a  chetools](https:
│ │ +00002250: 2f2f 6769 7468 7562 2e63 6f6d 2f74 6b65  //github.com/tke

│ │ +00002270: 7673 2e20 5b67 7075 7374 6174 5d28 6874  vs. [gpustat](ht

│ │ +000022b0: 696e 666f 726d 6174 696f 6e20 7573 696e  information usin
│ │ +000022c0: 6720 7468 6520 6063 7572 7365 7360 206c  g the `curses` l

│ │ +00002340: 6368 726f 6e6f 7573 6c79 2067 6174 6865  chronously gathe
│ │ +00002350: 7220 696e 666f 726d 6174 696f 6e20 7573  r information us
│ │ +00002360: 696e 6720 6d75 6c74 692d 7468 7265 6164  ing multi-thread
│ │ +00002370: 696e 6720 616e 6420 636f 7272 6573 706f  ing and correspo
│ │ +00002380: 6e64 2074 6f20 7573 6572 2069 6e70 7574  nd to user input
│ │ +00002390: 206d 7563 6820 6661 7374 6572 2e20 2876   much faster. (v
│ │ +000023a0: 732e 205b 6e76 746f 705d 2868 7474 7073  s. [nvtop](https
│ │ +000023b0: 3a2f 2f67 6974 6875 622e 636f 6d2f 5379  ://github.com/Sy
│ │ +000023c0: 6c6c 6f2f 6e76 746f 7029 290a 2d20 2a2a  llo/nvtop)).- **
│ │ +000023d0: 506f 7274 6162 6c65 2a2a 3a20 776f 726b  Portable**: work
│ │ +000023e0: 206f 6e20 626f 7468 204c 696e 7578 2061   on both Linux a
│ │ +000023f0: 6e64 2057 696e 646f 7773 2e0a 2020 2d20  nd Windows..  - 
│ │ +00002400: 6765 7420 686f 7374 2070 726f 6365 7373  get host process
│ │ +00002410: 2069 6e66 6f72 6d61 7469 6f6e 2075 7369   information usi
│ │ +00002420: 6e67 2074 6865 2063 726f 7373 2d70 6c61  ng the cross-pla
│ │ +00002430: 7466 6f72 6d20 6c69 6272 6172 7920 5b70  tform library [p

│ │ +00002520: 686f 6e2c 2065 6173 7920 746f 2069 6e73  hon, easy to ins
│ │ +00002530: 7461 6c6c 2077 6974 6820 6070 6970 602e  tall with `pip`.
│ │ +00002540: 2028 7673 2e20 5b6e 7674 6f70 5d28 6874   (vs. [nvtop](ht

│ │ +00002570: 202a 2a49 6e74 6567 7261 626c 652a 2a3a   **Integrable**:
│ │ +00002580: 2065 6173 7920 746f 2069 6e74 6567 7261   easy to integra
│ │ +00002590: 7465 2069 6e74 6f20 6f74 6865 7220 6170  te into other ap
│ │ +000025a0: 706c 6963 6174 696f 6e73 2c20 6d6f 7265  plications, more

│ │ +000025c0: 2e20 2876 732e 205b 6e76 6964 6961 2d68  . (vs. [nvidia-h

│ │ +00002780: 7974 686f 6e20 332e 372b 0a2d 204e 5649  ython 3.7+.- NVI

│ │ +00002830: 656d 656e 7420 4c69 6272 6172 7920 282a  ement Library (*

│ │ +00002870: 6765 6d65 6e74 2d6c 6962 7261 7279 2d6e  gement-library-n
│ │ +00002880: 766d 6c29 2069 7320 6120 432d 6261 7365  vml) is a C-base
│ │ +00002890: 6420 7072 6f67 7261 6d6d 6174 6963 2069  d programmatic i
│ │ +000028a0: 6e74 6572 6661 6365 2066 6f72 206d 6f6e  nterface for mon
│ │ +000028b0: 6974 6f72 696e 6720 616e 6420 6d61 6e61  itoring and mana
│ │ +000028c0: 6769 6e67 2076 6172 696f 7573 2073 7461  ging various sta
│ │ +000028d0: 7465 732e 2054 6865 2072 756e 7469 6d65  tes. The runtime
│ │ +000028e0: 2076 6572 7369 6f6e 206f 6620 4e56 4d4c   version of NVML
│ │ +000028f0: 206c 6962 7261 7279 2073 6869 7073 2077   library ships w
│ │ +00002900: 6974 6820 7468 6520 4e56 4944 4941 2064  ith the NVIDIA d
│ │ +00002910: 6973 706c 6179 2064 7269 7665 7220 2861  isplay driver (a
│ │ +00002920: 7661 696c 6162 6c65 2061 7420 5b44 6f77  vailable at [Dow
│ │ +00002930: 6e6c 6f61 6420 4472 6976 6572 7320 7c20  nload Drivers |

│ │ +00002950: 7777 772e 6e76 6964 6961 2e63 6f6d 2f44  www.nvidia.com/D

│ │ +00002970: 7078 2929 2c20 6f72 2063 616e 2062 6520  px)), or can be 
│ │ +00002980: 646f 776e 6c6f 6164 6564 2061 7320 7061  downloaded as pa
│ │ +00002990: 7274 206f 6620 7468 6520 4e56 4944 4941  rt of the NVIDIA

│ │ +000029c0: 4120 546f 6f6c 6b69 7420 7c20 4e56 4944  A Toolkit | NVID

│ │ +00002a10: 206c 6973 7473 206f 6620 4f53 2070 6c61   lists of OS pla

│ │ +00002a30: 412d 4750 5573 2073 7570 706f 7274 6564  A-GPUs supported
│ │ +00002a40: 2062 7920 7468 6520 4e56 4d4c 206c 6962   by the NVML lib

│ │ +00003310: 4966 2079 6f75 2065 6e63 6f75 6e74 6572  If you encounter

│ │ +000034f0: 2d2d 2d2d 0a0a 2323 2055 7361 6765 0a0a  ----..## Usage..
│ │ +00003500: 2323 2320 4465 7669 6365 2061 6e64 2050  ### Device and P
│ │ +00003510: 726f 6365 7373 2053 7461 7475 730a 0a51  rocess Status..Q
│ │ +00003520: 7565 7279 2074 6865 2064 6576 6963 6520  uery the device 
│ │ +00003530: 616e 6420 7072 6f63 6573 7320 7374 6174  and process stat
│ │ +00003540: 7573 2e20 5468 6520 6f75 7470 7574 2069  us. The output i
│ │ +00003550: 7320 7369 6d69 6c61 7220 746f 2060 6e76  s similar to `nv
│ │ +00003560: 6964 6961 2d73 6d69 602c 2062 7574 2068  idia-smi`, but h
│ │ +00003570: 6173 2062 6565 6e20 656e 7269 6368 6564  as been enriched
│ │ +00003580: 2061 6e64 2063 6f6c 6f72 697a 6564 2e0a   and colorized..
│ │ +00003590: 0a60 6060 6261 7368 0a23 2051 7565 7279  .```bash.# Query
│ │ +000035a0: 2073 7461 7475 7320 6f66 2061 6c6c 2064   status of all d
│ │ +000035b0: 6576 6963 6573 0a24 206e 7669 746f 7020  evices.$ nvitop 
│ │ +000035c0: 2d31 2020 2320 6f72 2075 7365 2060 7079  -1  # or use `py
│ │ +000035d0: 7468 6f6e 3320 2d6d 206e 7669 746f 7020  thon3 -m nvitop 
│ │ +000035e0: 2d31 600a 0a23 2053 7065 6369 6679 2071  -1`..# Specify q
│ │ +000035f0: 7565 7279 2064 6576 6963 6573 2028 6279  uery devices (by
│ │ +00003600: 2069 6e74 6567 6572 2069 6e64 6963 6573   integer indices
│ │ +00003610: 290a 2420 6e76 6974 6f70 202d 3120 2d6f  ).$ nvitop -1 -o
│ │ +00003620: 2030 2031 2020 2320 6f6e 6c79 2073 686f   0 1  # only sho
│ │ +00003630: 7720 3c47 5055 2030 3e20 616e 6420 3c47  w <GPU 0> and <G
│ │ +00003640: 5055 2031 3e0a 0a23 204f 6e6c 7920 7368  PU 1>..# Only sh
│ │ +00003650: 6f77 2064 6576 6963 6573 2069 6e20 6043  ow devices in `C
│ │ +00003660: 5544 415f 5649 5349 424c 455f 4445 5649  UDA_VISIBLE_DEVI
│ │ +00003670: 4345 5360 2028 6279 2069 6e74 6567 6572  CES` (by integer
│ │ +00003680: 2069 6e64 6963 6573 206f 7220 5555 4944   indices or UUID
│ │ +00003690: 2073 7472 696e 6773 290a 2420 6e76 6974   strings).$ nvit
│ │ +000036a0: 6f70 202d 3120 2d6f 760a 0a23 204f 6e6c  op -1 -ov..# Onl
│ │ +000036b0: 7920 7368 6f77 2047 5055 2070 726f 6365  y show GPU proce
│ │ +000036c0: 7373 6573 2077 6974 6820 7468 6520 636f  sses with the co
│ │ +000036d0: 6d70 7574 6520 636f 6e74 6578 7420 2874  mpute context (t
│ │ +000036e0: 7970 653a 2027 4327 206f 7220 2743 2b47  ype: 'C' or 'C+G
│ │ +000036f0: 2729 0a24 206e 7669 746f 7020 2d31 202d  ').$ nvitop -1 -
│ │ +00003700: 630a 6060 600a 0a57 6865 6e20 7468 6520  c.```..When the 
│ │ +00003710: 602d 3160 2073 7769 7463 6820 6973 206f  `-1` switch is o
│ │ +00003720: 6e2c 2074 6865 2072 6573 756c 7420 7769  n, the result wi
│ │ +00003730: 6c6c 2062 6520 6469 7370 6c61 7965 6420  ll be displayed 
│ │ +00003740: 2a2a 4f4e 4c59 204f 4e43 452a 2a20 2873  **ONLY ONCE** (s
│ │ +00003750: 616d 6520 6173 2074 6865 2064 6566 6175  ame as the defau
│ │ +00003760: 6c74 2062 6568 6176 696f 7220 6f66 2060  lt behavior of `
│ │ +00003770: 6e76 6964 6961 2d73 6d69 6029 2e20 5468  nvidia-smi`). Th
│ │ +00003780: 6973 2069 7320 6d75 6368 2066 6173 7465  is is much faste
│ │ +00003790: 7220 616e 6420 6861 7320 6c6f 7765 7220  r and has lower 
│ │ +000037a0: 7265 736f 7572 6365 2075 7361 6765 2e20  resource usage. 
│ │ +000037b0: 5365 6520 5b43 6f6d 6d61 6e64 204c 696e  See [Command Lin
│ │ +000037c0: 6520 4f70 7469 6f6e 735d 2823 636f 6d6d  e Options](#comm
│ │ +000037d0: 616e 642d 6c69 6e65 2d6f 7074 696f 6e73  and-line-options
│ │ +000037e0: 2d61 6e64 2d65 6e76 6972 6f6e 6d65 6e74  -and-environment
│ │ +000037f0: 2d76 6172 6961 626c 6573 2920 666f 7220  -variables) for 
│ │ +00003800: 6d6f 7265 2063 6f6d 6d61 6e64 206f 7074  more command opt
│ │ +00003810: 696f 6e73 2e0a 0a54 6865 7265 2069 7320  ions...There is 
│ │ +00003820: 616c 736f 2061 2043 4c49 2074 6f6f 6c20  also a CLI tool 
│ │ +00003830: 6361 6c6c 6564 2060 6e76 6973 656c 6020  called `nvisel` 
│ │ +00003840: 7468 6174 2073 6869 7073 2077 6974 6820  that ships with 
│ │ +00003850: 7468 6520 606e 7669 746f 7060 2050 7950  the `nvitop` PyP
│ │ +00003860: 4920 7061 636b 6167 652e 2053 6565 205b  I package. See [
│ │ +00003870: 4355 4441 2056 6973 6962 6c65 2044 6576  CUDA Visible Dev
│ │ +00003880: 6963 6573 2053 656c 6563 7469 6f6e 2054  ices Selection T

│ │ +000038a0: 6c65 2d64 6576 6963 6573 2d73 656c 6563  le-devices-selec
│ │ +000038b0: 7469 6f6e 2d74 6f6f 6c29 2066 6f72 206d  tion-tool) for m
│ │ +000038c0: 6f72 6520 696e 666f 726d 6174 696f 6e2e  ore information.
│ │ +000038d0: 0a0a 2323 2320 5265 736f 7572 6365 204d  ..### Resource M
│ │ +000038e0: 6f6e 6974 6f72 0a0a 5275 6e20 6173 2061  onitor..Run as a
│ │ +000038f0: 2072 6573 6f75 7263 6520 6d6f 6e69 746f   resource monito
│ │ +00003900: 723a 0a0a 6060 6062 6173 680a 2320 4d6f  r:..```bash.# Mo
│ │ +00003910: 6e69 746f 7220 6d6f 6465 2028 7768 656e  nitor mode (when
│ │ +00003920: 2074 6865 2064 6973 706c 6179 206d 6f64   the display mod
│ │ +00003930: 6520 6973 206f 6d69 7474 6564 2c20 604e  e is omitted, `N
│ │ +00003940: 5649 544f 505f 4d4f 4e49 544f 525f 4d4f  VITOP_MONITOR_MO
│ │ +00003950: 4445 6020 7769 6c6c 2062 6520 7573 6564  DE` will be used
│ │ +00003960: 290a 2420 6e76 6974 6f70 2020 2320 6f72  ).$ nvitop  # or
│ │ +00003970: 2075 7365 2060 7079 7468 6f6e 3320 2d6d   use `python3 -m

│ │ +000039a0: 7572 6520 7468 6520 6469 7370 6c61 7920  ure the display

│ │ +000039c0: 6f20 7468 6520 7465 726d 696e 616c 2073  o the terminal s

│ │ +00003a10: 6c61 7920 6173 2060 6675 6c6c 6020 6d6f  lay as `full` mo

│ │ +00003b60: 204f 6e6c 7920 7368 6f77 2047 5055 2070   Only show GPU p

│ │ +00003b80: 6520 636f 6d70 7574 6520 636f 6e74 6578  e compute contex

│ │ +00003bc0: 6368 6172 6163 7465 7273 206f 6e6c 790a  characters only.

│ │ +00003c40: 7275 6d2d 6c69 6b65 2062 6172 2063 6861  rum-like bar cha
│ │ +00003c50: 7274 7320 2872 6571 7569 7265 7320 7468  rts (requires th
│ │ +00003c60: 6520 7465 726d 696e 616c 2073 7570 706f  e terminal suppo
│ │ +00003c70: 7274 7320 3235 362d 636f 6c6f 7229 0a24  rts 256-color).$

│ │ +00003c90: 756c 0a60 6060 0a0a 596f 7520 6361 6e20  ul.```..You can 
│ │ +00003ca0: 636f 6e66 6967 7572 6520 7468 6520 6465  configure the de

│ │ +00003d10: 7429 2e20 5365 6520 5b43 6f6d 6d61 6e64  t). See [Command
│ │ +00003d20: 204c 696e 6520 4f70 7469 6f6e 7320 616e   Line Options an

│ │ +00003d90: 6e73 2e0a 0a49 6e20 6d6f 6e69 746f 7220  ns...In monitor 
│ │ +00003da0: 6d6f 6465 2c20 796f 7520 6361 6e20 7573  mode, you can us
│ │ +00003db0: 6520 3c6b 6264 3e43 7472 6c2d 633c 2f6b  e <kbd>Ctrl-c</k

│ │ +00003df0: 7570 7420 2f20 7465 726d 696e 6174 6520  upt / terminate 
│ │ +00003e00: 2f20 6b69 6c6c 2061 2070 726f 6365 7373  / kill a process
│ │ +00003e10: 2e20 416e 6420 6974 2773 2072 6563 6f6d  . And it's recom
│ │ +00003e20: 6d65 6e64 6564 2074 6f20 2a74 6572 6d69  mended to *termi
│ │ +00003e30: 6e61 7465 2a20 6f72 202a 6b69 6c6c 2a20  nate* or *kill*

│ │ +00003e60: 6565 6e2a 2a20 2873 686f 7274 6375 743a  een** (shortcut:
│ │ +00003e70: 203c 6b62 643e 743c 2f6b 6264 3e29 2e20   <kbd>t</kbd>). 
│ │ +00003e80: 466f 7220 6e6f 726d 616c 2075 7365 7273  For normal users
│ │ +00003e90: 2c20 606e 7669 746f 7060 2077 696c 6c20  , `nvitop` will 
│ │ +00003ea0: 7368 616c 6c6f 7720 6f74 6865 7220 7573  shallow other us
│ │ +00003eb0: 6572 7327 2070 726f 6365 7373 6573 2028  ers' processes (
│ │ +00003ec0: 696e 206c 6f77 2d69 6e74 656e 7369 7479  in low-intensity
│ │ +00003ed0: 2063 6f6c 6f72 7329 2e20 466f 7220 2a2a   colors). For **
│ │ +00003ee0: 7379 7374 656d 2061 646d 696e 6973 7472  system administr
│ │ +00003ef0: 6174 6f72 732a 2a2c 2079 6f75 2063 616e  ators**, you can
│ │ +00003f00: 2075 7365 2060 7375 646f 206e 7669 746f   use `sudo nvito
│ │ +00003f10: 7060 2074 6f20 7465 726d 696e 6174 6520  p` to terminate 
│ │ +00003f20: 6f74 6865 7220 7573 6572 7327 2070 726f  other users' pro
│ │ +00003f30: 6365 7373 6573 2e0a 0a41 6c73 6f2c 2074  cesses...Also, t
│ │ +00003f40: 6f20 656e 7465 7220 7468 6520 7072 6f63  o enter the proc
│ │ +00003f50: 6573 7320 6d65 7472 6963 7320 7363 7265  ess metrics scre
│ │ +00003f60: 656e 2c20 7365 6c65 6374 2061 2070 726f  en, select a pro
│ │ +00003f70: 6365 7373 2061 6e64 2074 6865 6e20 7072  cess and then pr
│ │ +00003f80: 6573 7320 7468 6520 3c6b 6264 3e45 6e74  ess the <kbd>Ent
│ │ +00003f90: 6572 3c2f 6b62 643e 202f 203c 6b62 643e  er</kbd> / <kbd>

│ │ +00003fb0: 202e 2060 6e76 6974 6f70 6020 6479 6e61   . `nvitop` dyna

│ │ +000042b0: 466f 7220 446f 636b 6572 2055 7365 7273  For Docker Users
│ │ +000042c0: 0a0a 4275 696c 6420 616e 6420 7275 6e20  ..Build and run 
│ │ +000042d0: 7468 6520 446f 636b 6572 2069 6d61 6765  the Docker image
│ │ +000042e0: 2075 7369 6e67 205b 6e76 6964 6961 2d64   using [nvidia-d
│ │ +000042f0: 6f63 6b65 725d 2868 7474 7073 3a2f 2f67  ocker](https://g
│ │ +00004300: 6974 6875 622e 636f 6d2f 4e56 4944 4941  ithub.com/NVIDIA
│ │ +00004310: 2f6e 7669 6469 612d 646f 636b 6572 293a  /nvidia-docker):
│ │ +00004320: 0a0a 6060 6062 6173 680a 6769 7420 636c  ..```bash.git cl
│ │ +00004330: 6f6e 6520 2d2d 6465 7074 683d 3120 6874  one --depth=1 ht
│ │ +00004340: 7470 733a 2f2f 6769 7468 7562 2e63 6f6d  tps://github.com
│ │ +00004350: 2f58 7565 6861 6950 616e 2f6e 7669 746f  /XuehaiPan/nvito
│ │ +00004360: 702e 6769 7420 2626 2063 6420 6e76 6974  p.git && cd nvit
│ │ +00004370: 6f70 2020 2320 636c 6f6e 6520 7468 6973  op  # clone this
│ │ +00004380: 2072 6570 6f20 6669 7273 740a 646f 636b   repo first.dock
│ │ +00004390: 6572 2062 7569 6c64 202d 2d74 6167 206e  er build --tag n
│ │ +000043a0: 7669 746f 703a 6c61 7465 7374 202e 2020  vitop:latest .  
│ │ +000043b0: 2320 6275 696c 6420 7468 6520 446f 636b  # build the Dock
│ │ +000043c0: 6572 2069 6d61 6765 0a64 6f63 6b65 7220  er image.docker 
│ │ +000043d0: 7275 6e20 2d69 7420 2d2d 726d 202d 2d72  run -it --rm --r
│ │ +000043e0: 756e 7469 6d65 3d6e 7669 6469 6120 2d2d  untime=nvidia --
│ │ +000043f0: 6770 7573 3d61 6c6c 202d 2d70 6964 3d68  gpus=all --pid=h
│ │ +00004400: 6f73 7420 6e76 6974 6f70 3a6c 6174 6573  ost nvitop:lates
│ │ +00004410: 7420 2023 2072 756e 2074 6865 2044 6f63  t  # run the Doc
│ │ +00004420: 6b65 7220 636f 6e74 6169 6e65 720a 6060  ker container.``
│ │ +00004430: 600a 0a54 6865 205b 6044 6f63 6b65 7266  `..The [`Dockerf
│ │ +00004440: 696c 6560 5d28 446f 636b 6572 6669 6c65  ile`](Dockerfile
│ │ +00004450: 2920 6861 7320 6120 6f70 7469 6f6e 616c  ) has a optional
│ │ +00004460: 2062 7569 6c64 2061 7267 756d 656e 7420   build argument

│ │ -000070f0: 2070 726f 6365 7373 6573 2062 7920 6025   processes by `%
│ │ -00007100: 4d45 4d60 2069 6e20 6465 7363 656e 6469  MEM` in descendi
│ │ -00007110: 6e67 2028 6173 6365 6e64 696e 6729 206f  ng (ascending) o
│ │ -00007120: 7264 6572 2e20 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020  rder.           
│ │ -00007130: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ -00007140: 207c 0a7c 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020   |.|            
│ │ -00007150: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ +000070d0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ +000070e0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ +000070f0: 2060 6f6d 6020 2860 6f4d 6029 207c 2053   `om` (`oM`) | S
│ │ +00007100: 6f72 7420 7072 6f63 6573 7365 7320 6279  ort processes by
│ │ +00007110: 2060 254d 454d 6020 696e 2064 6573 6365   `%MEM` in desce
│ │ +00007120: 6e64 696e 6720 2861 7363 656e 6469 6e67  nding (ascending
│ │ +00007130: 2920 6f72 6465 722e 2020 2020 2020 2020  ) order.        
│ │ +00007140: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ +00007150: 2020 2020 7c0a 7c20 2020 2020 2020 2020      |.|

│ │ -000071d0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ -000071e0: 2020 2020 2020 207c 0a0a 2a2a 4849 4e54         |..**HINT
│ │ -000071f0: 3a2a 2a20 4974 2773 2072 6563 6f6d 6d65  :** It's recomme

│ │ -00007210: 6520 6f72 206b 696c 6c20 6120 7072 6f63  e or kill a proc

│ │ -00007c00: 6634 3461 3233 3739 340a 6060 600a 0a59  f44a23794.```..Y
│ │ -00007c10: 6f75 2063 616e 2061 6c73 6f20 696e 7465  ou can also inte
│ │ -00007c20: 6772 6174 6520 606e 7669 7365 6c60 2069  grate `nvisel` i
│ │ -00007c30: 6e74 6f20 796f 7572 2074 7261 696e 696e  nto your trainin
│ │ -00007c40: 6720 7363 7269 7074 206c 696b 6520 7468  g script like th
│ │ -00007c50: 6973 3a0a 0a60 6060 7079 7468 6f6e 0a23  is:..```python.#
│ │ -00007c60: 2050 7574 2074 6869 7320 6174 2074 6865   Put this at the
│ │ -00007c70: 2074 6f70 206f 6620 7468 6520 5079 7468   top of the Pyth
│ │ -00007c80: 6f6e 2073 6372 6970 740a 696d 706f 7274  on script.import
│ │ -00007c90: 206f 730a 6672 6f6d 206e 7669 746f 7020   os.from nvitop 
│ │ -00007ca0: 696d 706f 7274 2073 656c 6563 745f 6465  import select_de
│ │ -00007cb0: 7669 6365 730a 0a6f 732e 656e 7669 726f  vices..os.enviro
│ │ -00007cc0: 6e5b 2743 5544 415f 5649 5349 424c 455f  n['CUDA_VISIBLE_
│ │ -00007cd0: 4445 5649 4345 5327 5d20 3d20 272c 272e  DEVICES'] = ','.
│ │ -00007ce0: 6a6f 696e 280a 2020 2020 7365 6c65 6374  join(.    select
│ │ -00007cf0: 5f64 6576 6963 6573 2866 6f72 6d61 743d  _devices(format=
│ │ -00007d00: 2775 7569 6427 2c20 6d69 6e5f 636f 756e  'uuid', min_coun
│ │ -00007d10: 743d 342c 206d 696e 5f66 7265 655f 6d65  t=4, min_free_me
│ │ -00007d20: 6d6f 7279 3d27 3847 6942 2729 0a29 0a60  mory='8GiB').).`
│ │ -00007d30: 6060 0a0a 5479 7065 2060 6e76 6973 656c  ``..Type `nvisel
│ │ -00007d40: 202d 2d68 656c 7060 2066 6f72 206d 6f72   --help` for mor
│ │ -00007d50: 6520 636f 6d6d 616e 6420 6f70 7469 6f6e  e command option
│ │ -00007d60: 733a 0a0a 6060 6074 6578 740a 7573 6167  s:..```text.usag
│ │ -00007d70: 653a 206e 7669 7365 6c20 5b2d 2d68 656c  e: nvisel [--hel
│ │ -00007d80: 705d 205b 2d2d 7665 7273 696f 6e5d 0a20  p] [--version]. 
│ │ -00007d90: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 205b 2d2d               [--
│ │ -00007da0: 696e 6865 7269 7420 5b43 5544 415f 5649  inherit [CUDA_VI
│ │ -00007db0: 5349 424c 455f 4445 5649 4345 535d 5d20  SIBLE_DEVICES]] 
│ │ -00007dc0: 5b2d 2d61 6363 6f75 6e74 2d61 732d 6672  [--account-as-fr
│ │ -00007dd0: 6565 205b 5553 4552 4e41 4d45 202e 2e2e  ee [USERNAME ...

│ │ -00008ce0: 6f6e 2877 6569 6768 7473 3d4e 6f6e 652c  on(weights=None,
│ │ -00008cf0: 202e 2e29 0a6d 6f64 656c 203d 206d 756c   ..).model = mul
│ │ -00008d00: 7469 5f67 7075 5f6d 6f64 656c 286d 6f64  ti_gpu_model(mod
│ │ -00008d10: 656c 2c20 6770 7573 2920 2023 206f 7074  el, gpus)  # opt
│ │ -00008d20: 696f 6e61 6c0a 6d6f 6465 6c2e 636f 6d70  ional.model.comp

│ │ -0000a8f0: 2066 6f72 2068 6f73 742c 2047 5055 7320   for host, GPUs

│ │ -0000a920: 732e 2041 6c6c 206d 6574 7269 6373 2077  s. All metrics w

│ │ -0000b6d0: 3d20 5265 736f 7572 6365 4d65 7472 6963  = ResourceMetric
│ │ -0000b6e0: 436f 6c6c 6563 746f 7228 6465 7669 6365  Collector(device
│ │ -0000b6f0: 733d 4375 6461 4465 7669 6365 2e61 6c6c  s=CudaDevice.all
│ │ -0000b700: 2829 2c20 2023 206c 6f67 2061 6c6c 2076  (),  # log all v
│ │ -0000b710: 6973 6962 6c65 2043 5544 4120 6465 7669  isible CUDA devi
│ │ -0000b720: 6365 7320 616e 6420 7573 6520 7468 6520  ces and use the 
│ │ -0000b730: 4355 4441 206f 7264 696e 616c 0a20 2020  CUDA ordinal.   
│ │ -0000b740: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ +00007180: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ +00007190: 2020 2020 2020 2060 6f74 6020 2860 6f54         `ot` (`oT
│ │ +000071a0: 6029 207c 2053 6f72 7420 7072 6f63 6573  `) | Sort proces
│ │ +000071b0: 7365 7320 6279 2060 5449 4d45 6020 696e  ses by `TIME` in
│ │ +000071c0: 2064 6573 6365 6e64 696e 6720 2861 7363   descending (asc
│ │ +000071d0: 656e 6469 6e67 2920 6f72 6465 722e 2020  ending) order.  
│ │ +000071e0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ +000071f0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 7c0a 0a2a 2a48            |..**H
│ │ +00007200: 494e 543a 2a2a 2049 7427 7320 7265 636f  INT:** It's reco

│ │ +00007220: 6e61 7465 206f 7220 6b69 6c6c 2061 2070  nate or kill a p

│ │ +00007250: 7368 6f72 7463 7574 3a20 3c6b 6264 3e74  shortcut: <kbd>t

│ │ +00007270: 0a0a 2323 2320 4355 4441 2056 6973 6962  ..### CUDA Visib
│ │ +00007280: 6c65 2044 6576 6963 6573 2053 656c 6563  le Devices Selec

│ │ +00007c20: 0a0a 596f 7520 6361 6e20 616c 736f 2069  ..You can also i
│ │ +00007c30: 6e74 6567 7261 7465 2060 6e76 6973 656c  ntegrate `nvisel
│ │ +00007c40: 6020 696e 746f 2079 6f75 7220 7472 6169  ` into your trai
│ │ +00007c50: 6e69 6e67 2073 6372 6970 7420 6c69 6b65  ning script like
│ │ +00007c60: 2074 6869 733a 0a0a 6060 6070 7974 686f   this:..```pytho
│ │ +00007c70: 6e0a 2320 5075 7420 7468 6973 2061 7420  n.# Put this at 
│ │ +00007c80: 7468 6520 746f 7020 6f66 2074 6865 2050  the top of the P
│ │ +00007c90: 7974 686f 6e20 7363 7269 7074 0a69 6d70  ython script.imp
│ │ +00007ca0: 6f72 7420 6f73 0a66 726f 6d20 6e76 6974  ort os.from nvit
│ │ +00007cb0: 6f70 2069 6d70 6f72 7420 7365 6c65 6374  op import select
│ │ +00007cc0: 5f64 6576 6963 6573 0a0a 6f73 2e65 6e76  _devices..os.env
│ │ +00007cd0: 6972 6f6e 5b27 4355 4441 5f56 4953 4942  iron['CUDA_VISIB
│ │ +00007ce0: 4c45 5f44 4556 4943 4553 275d 203d 2027  LE_DEVICES'] = '
│ │ +00007cf0: 2c27 2e6a 6f69 6e28 0a20 2020 2073 656c  ,'.join(.    sel
│ │ +00007d00: 6563 745f 6465 7669 6365 7328 666f 726d  ect_devices(form
│ │ +00007d10: 6174 3d27 7575 6964 272c 206d 696e 5f63  at='uuid', min_c
│ │ +00007d20: 6f75 6e74 3d34 2c20 6d69 6e5f 6672 6565  ount=4, min_free
│ │ +00007d30: 5f6d 656d 6f72 793d 2738 4769 4227 290a  _memory='8GiB').
│ │ +00007d40: 290a 6060 600a 0a54 7970 6520 606e 7669  ).```..Type `nvi
│ │ +00007d50: 7365 6c20 2d2d 6865 6c70 6020 666f 7220  sel --help` for 
│ │ +00007d60: 6d6f 7265 2063 6f6d 6d61 6e64 206f 7074  more command opt
│ │ +00007d70: 696f 6e73 3a0a 0a60 6060 7465 7874 0a75  ions:..```text.u
│ │ +00007d80: 7361 6765 3a20 6e76 6973 656c 205b 2d2d  sage: nvisel [--
│ │ +00007d90: 6865 6c70 5d20 5b2d 2d76 6572 7369 6f6e  help] [--version
│ │ +00007da0: 5d0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020  ].              
│ │ +00007db0: 5b2d 2d69 6e68 6572 6974 205b 4355 4441  [--inherit [CUDA
│ │ +00007dc0: 5f56 4953 4942 4c45 5f44 4556 4943 4553  _VISIBLE_DEVICES
│ │ +00007dd0: 5d5d 205b 2d2d 6163 636f 756e 742d 6173  ]] [--account-as
│ │ +00007de0: 2d66 7265 6520 5b55 5345 524e 414d 4520  -free [USERNAME 
│ │ +00007df0: 2e2e 2e5d 5d0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020  ...]].          
│ │ +00007e00: 2020 2020 5b2d 2d6d 696e 2d63 6f75 6e74      [--min-count
│ │ +00007e10: 204e 5d20 5b2d 2d6d 6178 2d63 6f75 6e74   N] [--max-count
│ │ +00007e20: 204e 5d20 5b2d 2d63 6f75 6e74 204e 5d0a   N] [--count N].
│ │ +00007e30: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 5b2d                [-
│ │ +00007e40: 2d6d 696e 2d66 7265 652d 6d65 6d6f 7279  -min-free-memory

│ │ +00008d30: 6f70 7469 6f6e 616c 0a6d 6f64 656c 2e63  optional.model.c

│ │ +00008df0: 0a2a 2a4e 4f54 453a 2a2a 2055 7365 7273  .**NOTE:** Users
│ │ +00008e00: 2073 686f 756c 6420 6173 7369 676e 2061   should assign a

│ │ +0000a860: 720a 0a5b 6052 6573 6f75 7263 654d 6574  r..[`ResourceMet

│ │ +0000a880: 7474 7073 3a2f 2f6e 7669 746f 702e 7265  ttps://nvitop.re

│ │ +0000a8d0: 6f6c 6c65 6374 6f72 2920 6973 2061 2063  ollector) is a c
│ │ +0000a8e0: 6c61 7373 2074 6861 7420 636f 6c6c 6563  lass that collec
│ │ +0000a8f0: 7473 2072 6573 6f75 7263 6520 6d65 7472  ts resource metr
│ │ +0000a900: 6963 7320 666f 7220 686f 7374 2c20 4750  ics for host, GP
│ │ +0000a910: 5573 2061 6e64 2070 726f 6365 7373 6573  Us and processes
│ │ +0000a920: 2072 756e 6e69 6e67 206f 6e20 7468 6520   running on the 
│ │ +0000a930: 4750 5573 2e20 416c 6c20 6d65 7472 6963  GPUs. All metric
│ │ +0000a940: 7320 7769 6c6c 2062 6520 636f 6c6c 6563  s will be collec
│ │ +0000a950: 7465 6420 696e 2061 6e20 6173 796e 6368  ted in an asynch
│ │ +0000a960: 726f 6e6f 7573 206d 616e 6e65 722e 2059  ronous manner. Y

│ │ -0000eed0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ -0000eee0: 2320 4e41 2069 7320 616e 2069 6e73 7461  # NA is an insta
│ │ -0000eef0: 6e63 6520 6f66 2060 7374 7260 0a27 6e2f  nce of `str`.'n/
│ │ -0000ef00: 6127 0a3e 3e3e 204e 412e 6c6a 7573 7428  a'.>>> NA.ljust(
│ │ -0000ef10: 3529 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020  5)              
│ │ -0000ef20: 2020 2020 2020 2320 4e41 2069 7320 616e        # NA is an
│ │ -0000ef30: 2069 6e73 7461 6e63 6520 6f66 2060 7374   instance of `st
│ │ -0000ef40: 7260 0a27 4e2f 4120 2027 0a3e 3e3e 204e  r`.'N/A  '.>>> N
│ │ -0000ef50: 4120 2b20 2773 7472 2720 2020 2020 2020  A + 'str'       
│ │ -0000ef60: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2320                # 
│ │ -0000ef70: 7374 7269 6e67 2063 6f6e 7461 6d69 6e61  string contamina
│ │ -0000ef80: 7469 6f6e 2069 6620 7468 6520 6f70 6572  tion if the oper
│ │ -0000ef90: 616e 6420 6973 2061 2073 7472 696e 670a  and is a string.
│ │ -0000efa0: 274e 2f41 7374 7227 0a0a 3e3e 3e20 666c  'N/Astr'..>>> fl
│ │ -0000efb0: 6f61 7428 4e41 2920 2020 2020 2020 2020  oat(NA)         
│ │ -0000efc0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2023 2065               # e
│ │ -0000efd0: 7870 6c69 6369 7420 636f 6e76 6572 7369  xplicit conversi
│ │ -0000efe0: 6f6e 2074 6f20 666c 6f61 7420 2860 6d61  on to float (`ma
│ │ -0000eff0: 7468 2e6e 616e 6029 0a6e 616e 0a3e 3e3e  th.nan`).nan.>>>
│ │ -0000f000: 204e 4120 2b20 3120 2020 2020 2020 2020   NA + 1         
│ │ -0000f010: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ -0000f020: 2320 6175 746f 2d63 6173 7469 6e67 2074  # auto-casting t
│ │ -0000f030: 6f20 666c 6f61 7420 6966 2074 6865 206f  o float if the o
│ │ -0000f040: 7065 7261 6e64 2069 7320 6120 6e75 6d62  perand is a numb
│ │ -0000f050: 6572 0a6e 616e 0a3e 3e3e 204e 4120 2a20  er.nan.>>> NA * 
│ │ -0000f060: 3130 3234 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020  1024            
│ │ -0000f070: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2320 6175 746f            # auto
│ │ -0000f080: 2d63 6173 7469 6e67 2074 6f20 666c 6f61  -casting to floa
│ │ -0000f090: 7420 6966 2074 6865 206f 7065 7261 6e64  t if the operand
│ │ -0000f0a0: 2069 7320 6120 6e75 6d62 6572 0a6e 616e   is a number.nan
│ │ -0000f0b0: 0a3e 3e3e 204e 4120 2f20 2831 3032 3420  .>>> NA / (1024 
│ │ -0000f0c0: 2a20 3130 3234 2920 2020 2020 2020 2020  * 1024)         
│ │ -0000f0d0: 2020 2020 2320 6175 746f 2d63 6173 7469      # auto-casti
│ │ -0000f0e0: 6e67 2074 6f20 666c 6f61 7420 6966 2074  ng to float if t
│ │ -0000f0f0: 6865 206f 7065 7261 6e64 2069 7320 6120  he operand is a 
│ │ -0000f100: 6e75 6d62 6572 0a6e 616e 0a60 6060 0a0a  number.nan.```..
│ │ -0000f110: 596f 7520 6361 6e20 7573 6520 6065 6e74  You can use `ent
│ │ -0000f120: 7279 2021 3d20 274e 2f41 2760 2063 6f6e  ry != 'N/A'` con
│ │ -0000f130: 6469 7469 6f6e 7320 746f 2061 766f 6964  ditions to avoid
│ │ -0000f140: 2065 7863 6570 7469 6f6e 732e 2049 7427   exceptions. It'
│ │ -0000f150: 7320 7361 6665 2074 6f20 7573 6520 6066  s safe to use `f
│ │ -0000f160: 6c6f 6174 2865 6e74 7279 2960 2066 6f72  loat(entry)` for
│ │ -0000f170: 206e 756d 6265 7273 2077 6869 6c65 2060   numbers while `
│ │ -0000f180: 4e61 5479 7065 6020 7769 6c6c 2062 6520  NaType` will be 
│ │ -0000f190: 636f 6e76 6572 7465 6420 746f 2060 6d61  converted to `ma
│ │ -0000f1a0: 7468 2e6e 616e 602e 2046 6f72 2065 7861  th.nan`. For exa
│ │ -0000f1b0: 6d70 6c65 3a0a 0a60 6060 7079 7468 6f6e  mple:..```python
│ │ -0000f1c0: 0a6d 656d 6f72 795f 7573 6564 3a20 556e  .memory_used: Un
│ │ -0000f1d0: 696f 6e5b 696e 742c 204e 6154 7970 655d  ion[int, NaType]
│ │ -0000f1e0: 203d 2064 6576 6963 652e 6d65 6d6f 7279   = device.memory
│ │ -0000f1f0: 5f75 7365 6428 2920 2020 2020 2020 2020  _used()         
│ │ -0000f200: 2020 2023 206d 656d 6f72 7920 7573 6167     # memory usag
│ │ -0000f210: 6520 696e 2062 7974 6573 206f 7220 6027  e in bytes or `'
│ │ -0000f220: 4e2f 4127 600a 6d65 6d6f 7279 5f75 7365  N/A'`.memory_use
│ │ -0000f230: 645f 696e 5f6d 6962 3a20 666c 6f61 7420  d_in_mib: float 
│ │ -0000f240: 2020 2020 2020 3d20 666c 6f61 7428 6d65        = float(me
│ │ -0000f250: 6d6f 7279 5f75 7365 6429 202f 2028 3120  mory_used) / (1 
│ │ -0000f260: 3c3c 2032 3029 2020 2320 6d65 6d6f 7279  << 20)  # memory
│ │ -0000f270: 2075 7361 6765 2069 6e20 4d65 6269 6279   usage in Mebiby
│ │ -0000f280: 7465 7320 284d 6942 2920 6f72 2060 6d61  tes (MiB) or `ma
│ │ -0000f290: 7468 2e6e 616e 600a 6060 600a 0a49 7427  th.nan`.```..It'
│ │ -0000f2a0: 7320 7361 6665 2074 6f20 636f 6d70 6172  s safe to compar
│ │ -0000f2b0: 6520 604e 6154 7970 6560 2077 6974 6820  e `NaType` with 
│ │ -0000f2c0: 6e75 6d62 6572 732c 2062 7574 2060 4e61  numbers, but `Na
│ │ -0000f2d0: 5479 7065 6020 6973 2061 6c77 6179 7320  Type` is always 
│ │ -0000f2e0: 6c61 7267 6572 2074 6861 6e20 616e 7920  larger than any 
│ │ -0000f2f0: 6e75 6d62 6572 3a0a 0a60 6060 7079 7468  number:..```pyth
│ │ -0000f300: 6f6e 0a64 6576 6963 6573 5f62 795f 7573  on.devices_by_us
│ │ -0000f310: 6564 5f6d 656d 6f72 7920 3d20 736f 7274  ed_memory = sort
│ │ -0000f320: 6564 2844 6576 6963 652e 616c 6c28 292c  ed(Device.all(),
│ │ -0000f330: 206b 6579 3d44 6576 6963 652e 6d65 6d6f   key=Device.memo
│ │ -0000f340: 7279 5f75 7365 642c 2072 6576 6572 7365  ry_used, reverse
│ │ -0000f350: 3d54 7275 6529 2020 2320 6974 2773 2073  =True)  # it's s
│ │ -0000f360: 6166 6520 746f 2063 6f6d 7061 7265 2060  afe to compare `
│ │ -0000f370: 274e 2f41 2760 2077 6974 6820 6e75 6d62  'N/A'` with numb
│ │ -0000f380: 6572 730a 6465 7669 6365 735f 6279 5f66  ers.devices_by_f
│ │ -0000f390: 7265 655f 6d65 6d6f 7279 203d 2073 6f72  ree_memory = sor
│ │ -0000f3a0: 7465 6428 4465 7669 6365 2e61 6c6c 2829  ted(Device.all()
│ │ -0000f3b0: 2c20 6b65 793d 4465 7669 6365 2e6d 656d  , key=Device.mem
│ │ -0000f3c0: 6f72 795f 6672 6565 2c20 7265 7665 7273  ory_free, revers
│ │ -0000f3d0: 653d 5472 7565 2920 2023 2070 6c65 6173  e=True)  # pleas
│ │ -0000f3e0: 6520 6164 6420 606d 656d 6f72 795f 6672  e add `memory_fr
│ │ -0000f3f0: 6565 2021 3d20 274e 2f41 2760 2063 6865  ee != 'N/A'` che
│ │ -0000f400: 636b 7320 6966 2073 6f72 7420 696e 2064  cks if sort in d
│ │ -0000f410: 6573 6365 6e64 696e 6720 6f72 6465 7220  escending order 
│ │ -0000f420: 6865 7265 0a60 6060 0a0a 5365 6520 5b60  here.```..See [`
│ │ -0000f430: 6e76 6974 6f70 2e4e 6154 7970 6560 5d28  nvitop.NaType`](
│ │ -0000f440: 6874 7470 733a 2f2f 6e76 6974 6f70 2e72  https://nvitop.r

│ │ -0000f490: 7469 6f6e 2066 6f72 206d 6f72 6520 6465  tion for more de

│ │ -0000f4b0: 6f63 6573 730a 0a54 6865 205b 7072 6f63  ocess..The [proc

│ │ +0000bf20: 7520 6361 6e20 616c 736f 2064 6165 6d6f  u can also daemo

│ │ +0000c070: 0a0a 6060 6070 7974 686f 6e0a 6672 6f6d  ..```python.from

│ │ +0000c0e0: 6563 7428 6d65 7472 6963 7329 3a20 2023  ect(metrics):  #

│ │ +0000c100: 7065 7269 6f64 6963 616c 6c79 0a20 2020  periodically.   
│ │ +0000c110: 2069 6620 6c6f 6767 6572 2e69 735f 636c   if logger.is_cl

│ │ +0000c1f0: 2829 2020 2320 636c 6561 6e75 700a 0a23  ()  # cleanup..#
│ │ +0000c200: 2052 6563 6f72 6420 6d65 7472 6963 7320   Record metrics 
│ │ +0000c210: 746f 2074 6865 206c 6f67 6765 7220 696e  to the logger in

│ │ +0000c230: 7920 3520 7365 636f 6e64 732e 0a23 2049  y 5 seconds..# I
│ │ +0000c240: 7420 7769 6c6c 2063 6f6c 6c65 6374 2035  t will collect 5
│ │ +0000c250: 2d73 6563 6f6e 6420 6d65 616e 2f6d 696e  -second mean/min

│ │ +0000c2e0: 2020 206f 6e5f 7374 6f70 3d6f 6e5f 7374     on_stop=on_st
│ │ +0000c2f0: 6f70 2c0a 290a 6060 600a 0a6f 7220 7369  op,.).```..or si
│ │ +0000c300: 6d70 6c79 3a0a 0a60 6060 7079 7468 6f6e  mply:..```python
│ │ +0000c310: 0a52 6573 6f75 7263 654d 6574 7269 6343  .ResourceMetricC
│ │ +0000c320: 6f6c 6c65 6374 6f72 2844 6576 6963 652e  ollector(Device.
│ │ +0000c330: 6375 6461 2e61 6c6c 2829 292e 6461 656d  cuda.all()).daem
│ │ +0000c340: 6f6e 697a 6528 0a20 2020 206f 6e5f 636f  onize(.    on_co
│ │ +0000c350: 6c6c 6563 742c 0a20 2020 2069 6e74 6572  llect,.    inter
│ │ +0000c360: 7661 6c3d 352e 302c 0a20 2020 206f 6e5f  val=5.0,.    on_

│ │ +0000ecc0: 7461 6c3d 3236 3834 3335 3435 362c 2066  tal=268435456, f
│ │ +0000ecd0: 7265 653d 3235 3736 3232 3031 362c 2075  ree=257622016, u
│ │ +0000ece0: 7365 643d 3130 3831 3334 3430 290a 6060  sed=10813440).``
│ │ +0000ecf0: 600a 0a2a 2a4e 4f54 453a 2a2a 2053 6f6d  `..**NOTE:** Som
│ │ +0000ed00: 6520 656e 7472 7920 7661 6c75 6573 206d  e entry values m
│ │ +0000ed10: 6179 2062 6520 6027 4e2f 4127 6020 2874  ay be `'N/A'` (t
│ │ +0000ed20: 7970 653a 205b 604e 6154 7970 6560 5d28  ype: [`NaType`](
│ │ +0000ed30: 6874 7470 733a 2f2f 6e76 6974 6f70 2e72  https://nvitop.r
│ │ +0000ed40: 6561 6474 6865 646f 6373 2e69 6f2f 656e  eadthedocs.io/en
│ │ +0000ed50: 2f6c 6174 6573 742f 696e 6465 782e 6874  /latest/index.ht
│ │ +0000ed60: 6d6c 236e 7669 746f 702e 4e61 5479 7065  ml#nvitop.NaType
│ │ +0000ed70: 292c 2073 7562 636c 6173 7320 6f66 2060  ), subclass of `
│ │ +0000ed80: 7374 7260 2920 7768 656e 2074 6865 2063  str`) when the c
│ │ +0000ed90: 6f72 7265 7370 6f6e 6469 6e67 2072 6573  orresponding res
│ │ +0000eda0: 6f75 7263 6573 2061 7265 206e 6f74 2061  ources are not a
│ │ +0000edb0: 7070 6c69 6361 626c 652e 2054 6865 205b  pplicable. The [
│ │ +0000edc0: 604e 4160 5d28 6874 7470 733a 2f2f 6e76  `NA`](https://nv
│ │ +0000edd0: 6974 6f70 2e72 6561 6474 6865 646f 6373  itop.readthedocs
│ │ +0000ede0: 2e69 6f2f 656e 2f6c 6174 6573 742f 696e  .io/en/latest/in
│ │ +0000edf0: 6465 782e 6874 6d6c 236e 7669 746f 702e  dex.html#nvitop.
│ │ +0000ee00: 4e41 2920 7661 6c75 6520 7375 7070 6f72  NA) value suppor
│ │ +0000ee10: 7473 2061 7269 7468 6d65 7469 6320 6f70  ts arithmetic op
│ │ +0000ee20: 6572 6174 696f 6e73 2e20 4974 2061 6374  erations. It act
│ │ +0000ee30: 7320 6c69 6b65 2060 6d61 7468 2e6e 616e  s like `math.nan
│ │ +0000ee40: 3a20 666c 6f61 7460 2e0a 0a60 6060 7079  : float`...```py
│ │ +0000ee50: 7468 6f6e 0a3e 3e3e 2066 726f 6d20 6e76  thon.>>> from nv
│ │ +0000ee60: 6974 6f70 2069 6d70 6f72 7420 4e41 0a3e  itop import NA.>
│ │ +0000ee70: 3e3e 204e 410a 274e 2f41 270a 0a3e 3e3e  >> NA.'N/A'..>>>
│ │ +0000ee80: 2027 6d65 6d6f 7279 2075 7361 6765 3a20   'memory usage: 
│ │ +0000ee90: 7b7d 272e 666f 726d 6174 284e 4129 2020  {}'.format(NA)  
│ │ +0000eea0: 2320 4e41 2069 7320 616e 2069 6e73 7461  # NA is an insta
│ │ +0000eeb0: 6e63 6520 6f66 2060 7374 7260 0a27 6d65  nce of `str`.'me
│ │ +0000eec0: 6d6f 7279 2075 7361 6765 3a20 4e2f 4127  mory usage: N/A'
│ │ +0000eed0: 0a3e 3e3e 204e 412e 6c6f 7765 7228 2920  .>>> NA.lower() 
│ │ +0000eee0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ +0000eef0: 2020 2020 2320 4e41 2069 7320 616e 2069      # NA is an i
│ │ +0000ef00: 6e73 7461 6e63 6520 6f66 2060 7374 7260  nstance of `str`
│ │ +0000ef10: 0a27 6e2f 6127 0a3e 3e3e 204e 412e 6c6a  .'n/a'.>>> NA.lj
│ │ +0000ef20: 7573 7428 3529 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020  ust(5)          
│ │ +0000ef30: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2320 4e41 2069            # NA i
│ │ +0000ef40: 7320 616e 2069 6e73 7461 6e63 6520 6f66  s an instance of
│ │ +0000ef50: 2060 7374 7260 0a27 4e2f 4120 2027 0a3e   `str`.'N/A  '.>
│ │ +0000ef60: 3e3e 204e 4120 2b20 2773 7472 2720 2020  >> NA + 'str'   
│ │ +0000ef70: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ +0000ef80: 2020 2320 7374 7269 6e67 2063 6f6e 7461    # string conta
│ │ +0000ef90: 6d69 6e61 7469 6f6e 2069 6620 7468 6520  mination if the 
│ │ +0000efa0: 6f70 6572 616e 6420 6973 2061 2073 7472  operand is a str
│ │ +0000efb0: 696e 670a 274e 2f41 7374 7227 0a0a 3e3e  ing.'N/Astr'..>>
│ │ +0000efc0: 3e20 666c 6f61 7428 4e41 2920 2020 2020  > float(NA)     
│ │ +0000efd0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ +0000efe0: 2023 2065 7870 6c69 6369 7420 636f 6e76   # explicit conv
│ │ +0000eff0: 6572 7369 6f6e 2074 6f20 666c 6f61 7420  ersion to float 
│ │ +0000f000: 2860 6d61 7468 2e6e 616e 6029 0a6e 616e  (`math.nan`).nan
│ │ +0000f010: 0a3e 3e3e 204e 4120 2b20 3120 2020 2020  .>>> NA + 1     
│ │ +0000f020: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ +0000f030: 2020 2020 2320 6175 746f 2d63 6173 7469      # auto-casti
│ │ +0000f040: 6e67 2074 6f20 666c 6f61 7420 6966 2074  ng to float if t
│ │ +0000f050: 6865 206f 7065 7261 6e64 2069 7320 6120  he operand is a 
│ │ +0000f060: 6e75 6d62 6572 0a6e 616e 0a3e 3e3e 204e  number.nan.>>> N
│ │ +0000f070: 4120 2a20 3130 3234 2020 2020 2020 2020  A * 1024        
│ │ +0000f080: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2320                # 
│ │ +0000f090: 6175 746f 2d63 6173 7469 6e67 2074 6f20  auto-casting to 
│ │ +0000f0a0: 666c 6f61 7420 6966 2074 6865 206f 7065  float if the ope
│ │ +0000f0b0: 7261 6e64 2069 7320 6120 6e75 6d62 6572  rand is a number
│ │ +0000f0c0: 0a6e 616e 0a3e 3e3e 204e 4120 2f20 2831  .nan.>>> NA / (1
│ │ +0000f0d0: 3032 3420 2a20 3130 3234 2920 2020 2020  024 * 1024)     
│ │ +0000f0e0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2320 6175 746f 2d63          # auto-c
│ │ +0000f0f0: 6173 7469 6e67 2074 6f20 666c 6f61 7420  asting to float 
│ │ +0000f100: 6966 2074 6865 206f 7065 7261 6e64 2069  if the operand i
│ │ +0000f110: 7320 6120 6e75 6d62 6572 0a6e 616e 0a60  s a number.nan.`
│ │ +0000f120: 6060 0a0a 596f 7520 6361 6e20 7573 6520  ``..You can use 
│ │ +0000f130: 6065 6e74 7279 2021 3d20 274e 2f41 2760  `entry != 'N/A'`
│ │ +0000f140: 2063 6f6e 6469 7469 6f6e 7320 746f 2061   conditions to a
│ │ +0000f150: 766f 6964 2065 7863 6570 7469 6f6e 732e  void exceptions.
│ │ +0000f160: 2049 7427 7320 7361 6665 2074 6f20 7573   It's safe to us
│ │ +0000f170: 6520 6066 6c6f 6174 2865 6e74 7279 2960  e `float(entry)`
│ │ +0000f180: 2066 6f72 206e 756d 6265 7273 2077 6869   for numbers whi
│ │ +0000f190: 6c65 2060 4e61 5479 7065 6020 7769 6c6c  le `NaType` will
│ │ +0000f1a0: 2062 6520 636f 6e76 6572 7465 6420 746f   be converted to
│ │ +0000f1b0: 2060 6d61 7468 2e6e 616e 602e 2046 6f72   `math.nan`. For
│ │ +0000f1c0: 2065 7861 6d70 6c65 3a0a 0a60 6060 7079   example:..```py
│ │ +0000f1d0: 7468 6f6e 0a6d 656d 6f72 795f 7573 6564  thon.memory_used
│ │ +0000f1e0: 3a20 556e 696f 6e5b 696e 742c 204e 6154  : Union[int, NaT
│ │ +0000f1f0: 7970 655d 203d 2064 6576 6963 652e 6d65  ype] = device.me
│ │ +0000f200: 6d6f 7279 5f75 7365 6428 2920 2020 2020  mory_used()     
│ │ +0000f210: 2020 2020 2020 2023 206d 656d 6f72 7920         # memory 
│ │ +0000f220: 7573 6167 6520 696e 2062 7974 6573 206f  usage in bytes o
│ │ +0000f230: 7220 6027 4e2f 4127 600a 6d65 6d6f 7279  r `'N/A'`.memory
│ │ +0000f240: 5f75 7365 645f 696e 5f6d 6962 3a20 666c  _used_in_mib: fl
│ │ +0000f250: 6f61 7420 2020 2020 2020 3d20 666c 6f61  oat       = floa
│ │ +0000f260: 7428 6d65 6d6f 7279 5f75 7365 6429 202f  t(memory_used) /
│ │ +0000f270: 2028 3120 3c3c 2032 3029 2020 2320 6d65   (1 << 20)  # me
│ │ +0000f280: 6d6f 7279 2075 7361 6765 2069 6e20 4d65  mory usage in Me
│ │ +0000f290: 6269 6279 7465 7320 284d 6942 2920 6f72  bibytes (MiB) or
│ │ +0000f2a0: 2060 6d61 7468 2e6e 616e 600a 6060 600a   `math.nan`.```.
│ │ +0000f2b0: 0a49 7427 7320 7361 6665 2074 6f20 636f  .It's safe to co
│ │ +0000f2c0: 6d70 6172 6520 604e 6154 7970 6560 2077  mpare `NaType` w
│ │ +0000f2d0: 6974 6820 6e75 6d62 6572 732c 2062 7574  ith numbers, but
│ │ +0000f2e0: 2060 4e61 5479 7065 6020 6973 2061 6c77   `NaType` is alw
│ │ +0000f2f0: 6179 7320 6c61 7267 6572 2074 6861 6e20  ays larger than 
│ │ +0000f300: 616e 7920 6e75 6d62 6572 3a0a 0a60 6060  any number:..```
│ │ +0000f310: 7079 7468 6f6e 0a64 6576 6963 6573 5f62  python.devices_b
│ │ +0000f320: 795f 7573 6564 5f6d 656d 6f72 7920 3d20  y_used_memory = 
│ │ +0000f330: 736f 7274 6564 2844 6576 6963 652e 616c  sorted(Device.al
│ │ +0000f340: 6c28 292c 206b 6579 3d44 6576 6963 652e  l(), key=Device.
│ │ +0000f350: 6d65 6d6f 7279 5f75 7365 642c 2072 6576  memory_used, rev
│ │ +0000f360: 6572 7365 3d54 7275 6529 2020 2320 6974  erse=True)  # it
│ │ +0000f370: 2773 2073 6166 6520 746f 2063 6f6d 7061  's safe to compa
│ │ +0000f380: 7265 2060 274e 2f41 2760 2077 6974 6820  re `'N/A'` with

│ │ +0000f430: 6465 7220 6865 7265 0a60 6060 0a0a 5365  der here.```..Se

│ │ +00012280: 6f70 7972 6967 6874 204e 6f74 6963 650a  opyright Notice.
│ │ +00012290: 0a50 6c65 6173 6520 6665 656c 2066 7265  .Please feel fre

│ │ +00012310: 6060 6070 7974 686f 6e0a 696d 706f 7274  ```python.import
│ │ +00012320: 206e 7669 746f 700a 696d 706f 7274 206e   nvitop.import n

│ │ -0000e850: 3130 3234 202a 2031 3032 3429 2020 2020  1024 * 1024)

│ │ -0000e870: 6361 7374 696e 6720 746f 2066 6c6f 6174  casting to float
│ │ -0000e880: 2069 6620 7468 6520 6f70 6572 616e 6420   if the operand 
│ │ -0000e890: 6973 2061 206e 756d 6265 720a 6e61 6e0a  is a number.nan.
│ │ -0000e8a0: 6060 600a 0a59 6f75 2063 616e 2075 7365  ```..You can use
│ │ -0000e8b0: 2060 656e 7472 7920 213d 2027 4e2f 4127   `entry != 'N/A'
│ │ -0000e8c0: 6020 636f 6e64 6974 696f 6e73 2074 6f20  ` conditions to 
│ │ -0000e8d0: 6176 6f69 6420 6578 6365 7074 696f 6e73  avoid exceptions
│ │ -0000e8e0: 2e20 4974 2773 2073 6166 6520 746f 2075  . It's safe to u
│ │ -0000e8f0: 7365 2060 666c 6f61 7428 656e 7472 7929  se `float(entry)
│ │ -0000e900: 6020 666f 7220 6e75 6d62 6572 7320 7768  ` for numbers wh
│ │ -0000e910: 696c 6520 604e 6154 7970 6560 2077 696c  ile `NaType` wil
│ │ -0000e920: 6c20 6265 2063 6f6e 7665 7274 6564 2074  l be converted t
│ │ -0000e930: 6f20 606d 6174 682e 6e61 6e60 2e20 466f  o `math.nan`. Fo
│ │ -0000e940: 7220 6578 616d 706c 653a 0a0a 6060 6070  r example:..```p
│ │ -0000e950: 7974 686f 6e0a 6d65 6d6f 7279 5f75 7365  ython.memory_use
│ │ -0000e960: 643a 2055 6e69 6f6e 5b69 6e74 2c20 4e61  d: Union[int, Na
│ │ -0000e970: 5479 7065 5d20 3d20 6465 7669 6365 2e6d  Type] = device.m
│ │ -0000e980: 656d 6f72 795f 7573 6564 2829 2020 2020  emory_used()    
│ │ -0000e990: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2320 6d65 6d6f 7279          # memory
│ │ -0000e9a0: 2075 7361 6765 2069 6e20 6279 7465 7320   usage in bytes

│ │ -0000e9c0: 795f 7573 6564 5f69 6e5f 6d69 623a 2066  y_used_in_mib: f

│ │ -0000ea20: 7220 606d 6174 682e 6e61 6e60 0a60 6060  r `math.nan`.```
│ │ -0000ea30: 0a0a 4974 2773 2073 6166 6520 746f 2063  ..It's safe to c
│ │ -0000ea40: 6f6d 7061 7265 2060 4e61 5479 7065 6020  ompare `NaType` 
│ │ -0000ea50: 7769 7468 206e 756d 6265 7273 2c20 6275  with numbers, bu
│ │ -0000ea60: 7420 604e 6154 7970 6560 2069 7320 616c  t `NaType` is al

│ │ -0000ea90: 6070 7974 686f 6e0a 6465 7669 6365 735f  `python.devices_

│ │ +0000e7d0: 2074 6865 206f 7065 7261 6e64 2069 7320   the operand is 
│ │ +0000e7e0: 6120 6e75 6d62 6572 0a6e 616e 0a3e 3e3e  a number.nan.>>>
│ │ +0000e7f0: 204e 4120 2a20 3130 3234 2020 2020 2020   NA * 1024      
│ │ +0000e800: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020                  
│ │ +0000e810: 2320 6175 746f 2d63 6173 7469 6e67 2074  # auto-casting t
│ │ +0000e820: 6f20 666c 6f61 7420 6966 2074 6865 206f  o float if the o
│ │ +0000e830: 7065 7261 6e64 2069 7320 6120 6e75 6d62  perand is a numb
│ │ +0000e840: 6572 0a6e 616e 0a3e 3e3e 204e 4120 2f20  er.nan.>>> NA / 
│ │ +0000e850: 2831 3032 3420 2a20 3130 3234 2920 2020  (1024 * 1024)   
│ │ +0000e860: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2320 6175 746f            # auto
│ │ +0000e870: 2d63 6173 7469 6e67 2074 6f20 666c 6f61  -casting to floa
│ │ +0000e880: 7420 6966 2074 6865 206f 7065 7261 6e64  t if the operand
│ │ +0000e890: 2069 7320 6120 6e75 6d62 6572 0a6e 616e   is a number.nan
│ │ +0000e8a0: 0a60 6060 0a0a 596f 7520 6361 6e20 7573  .```..You can us
│ │ +0000e8b0: 6520 6065 6e74 7279 2021 3d20 274e 2f41  e `entry != 'N/A
│ │ +0000e8c0: 2760 2063 6f6e 6469 7469 6f6e 7320 746f  '` conditions to
│ │ +0000e8d0: 2061 766f 6964 2065 7863 6570 7469 6f6e   avoid exception
│ │ +0000e8e0: 732e 2049 7427 7320 7361 6665 2074 6f20  s. It's safe to 
│ │ +0000e8f0: 7573 6520 6066 6c6f 6174 2865 6e74 7279  use `float(entry
│ │ +0000e900: 2960 2066 6f72 206e 756d 6265 7273 2077  )` for numbers w
│ │ +0000e910: 6869 6c65 2060 4e61 5479 7065 6020 7769  hile `NaType` wi
│ │ +0000e920: 6c6c 2062 6520 636f 6e76 6572 7465 6420  ll be converted 
│ │ +0000e930: 746f 2060 6d61 7468 2e6e 616e 602e 2046  to `math.nan`. F
│ │ +0000e940: 6f72 2065 7861 6d70 6c65 3a0a 0a60 6060  or example:..```
│ │ +0000e950: 7079 7468 6f6e 0a6d 656d 6f72 795f 7573  python.memory_us
│ │ +0000e960: 6564 3a20 556e 696f 6e5b 696e 742c 204e  ed: Union[int, N
│ │ +0000e970: 6154 7970 655d 203d 2064 6576 6963 652e  aType] = device.
│ │ +0000e980: 6d65 6d6f 7279 5f75 7365 6428 2920 2020  memory_used()   
│ │ +0000e990: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2023 206d 656d 6f72           # memor
│ │ +0000e9a0: 7920 7573 6167 6520 696e 2062 7974 6573  y usage in bytes
│ │ +0000e9b0: 206f 7220 6027 4e2f 4127 600a 6d65 6d6f   or `'N/A'`.memo
│ │ +0000e9c0: 7279 5f75 7365 645f 696e 5f6d 6962 3a20  ry_used_in_mib: 
│ │ +0000e9d0: 666c 6f61 7420 2020 2020 2020 3d20 666c  float       = fl
│ │ +0000e9e0: 6f61 7428 6d65 6d6f 7279 5f75 7365 6429  oat(memory_used)
│ │ +0000e9f0: 202f 2028 3120 3c3c 2032 3029 2020 2320   / (1 << 20)  # 
│ │ +0000ea00: 6d65 6d6f 7279 2075 7361 6765 2069 6e20  memory usage in 
│ │ +0000ea10: 4d65 6269 6279 7465 7320 284d 6942 2920  Mebibytes (MiB) 
│ │ +0000ea20: 6f72 2060 6d61 7468 2e6e 616e 600a 6060  or `math.nan`.``
│ │ +0000ea30: 600a 0a49 7427 7320 7361 6665 2074 6f20  `..It's safe to 
│ │ +0000ea40: 636f 6d70 6172 6520 604e 6154 7970 6560  compare `NaType`
│ │ +0000ea50: 2077 6974 6820 6e75 6d62 6572 732c 2062   with numbers, b
│ │ +0000ea60: 7574 2060 4e61 5479 7065 6020 6973 2061  ut `NaType` is a
│ │ +0000ea70: 6c77 6179 7320 6c61 7267 6572 2074 6861  lways larger tha
│ │ +0000ea80: 6e20 616e 7920 6e75 6d62 6572 3a0a 0a60  n any number:..`
│ │ +0000ea90: 6060 7079 7468 6f6e 0a64 6576 6963 6573  ``python.devices
│ │ +0000eaa0: 5f62 795f 7573 6564 5f6d 656d 6f72 7920  _by_used_memory 
│ │ +0000eab0: 3d20 736f 7274 6564 2844 6576 6963 652e  = sorted(Device.
│ │ +0000eac0: 616c 6c28 292c 206b 6579 3d44 6576 6963  all(), key=Devic
│ │ +0000ead0: 652e 6d65 6d6f 7279 5f75 7365 642c 2072  e.memory_used, r
│ │ +0000eae0: 6576 6572 7365 3d54 7275 6529 2020 2320  everse=True)  # 
│ │ +0000eaf0: 6974 2773 2073 6166 6520 746f 2063 6f6d  it's safe to com
│ │ +0000eb00: 7061 7265 2060 274e 2f41 2760 2077 6974  pare `'N/A'` wit
│ │ +0000eb10: 6820 6e75 6d62 6572 730a 6465 7669 6365  h numbers.device
│ │ +0000eb20: 735f 6279 5f66 7265 655f 6d65 6d6f 7279  s_by_free_memory
│ │ +0000eb30: 203d 2073 6f72 7465 6428 4465 7669 6365   = sorted(Device
│ │ +0000eb40: 2e61 6c6c 2829 2c20 6b65 793d 4465 7669  .all(), key=Devi
│ │ +0000eb50: 6365 2e6d 656d 6f72 795f 6672 6565 2c20  ce.memory_free, 
│ │ +0000eb60: 7265 7665 7273 653d 5472 7565 2920 2023  reverse=True)  #
│ │ +0000eb70: 2070 6c65 6173 6520 6164 6420 606d 656d   please add `mem
│ │ +0000eb80: 6f72 795f 6672 6565 2021 3d20 274e 2f41  ory_free != 'N/A
│ │ +0000eb90: 2760 2063 6865 636b 7320 6966 2073 6f72  '` checks if sor
│ │ +0000eba0: 7420 696e 2064 6573 6365 6e64 696e 6720  t in descending 
│ │ +0000ebb0: 6f72 6465 7220 6865 7265 0a60 6060 0a0a  order here.```..
│ │ +0000ebc0: 5365 6520 5b60 6e76 6974 6f70 2e4e 6154  See [`nvitop.NaT

│ │          # I interpret invalid buttons as "scroll down" because all tested
│ │          # systems have a broken curses implementation and this is a workaround.
│ │          # Recently it seems to have been fixed, as 2**21 was introduced as
│ │          # the code for the "scroll down" button.
│ │          if self.pressed(4):
│ │              return -self.CTRL_SCROLLWHEEL_MULTIPLIER if self.ctrl() else -1

│ │ -000019f0: 204e 5649 4449 4120 6465 7669 6365 2061   NVIDIA device a

│ │ -00001a10: 6f72 696e 6720 746f 6f6c 2e20 4974 2068  oring tool. It h
│ │ -00001a20: 6173 2061 2063 6f6c 6f72 6675 6c20 616e  as a colorful an
│ │ -00001a30: 6420 696e 666f 726d 6174 6976 6520 696e  d informative in
│ │ -00001a40: 7465 7266 6163 6520 7468 6174 2063 6f6e  terface that con

│ │ -00001a70: 7468 6520 6465 7669 6365 7320 616e 6420  the devices and 
│ │ -00001a80: 7072 6f63 6573 7365 732e 2041 7320 6120  processes. As a 
│ │ -00001a90: 7265 736f 7572 6365 206d 6f6e 6974 6f72  resource monitor
│ │ -00001aa0: 2c20 6974 2069 6e63 6c75 6465 7320 6d61  , it includes ma

│ │ -00001ad0: 2074 7265 652d 7669 6577 2c20 656e 7669   tree-view, envi

│ │ -00001b30: 796f 6e64 2074 6861 742c 2074 6865 2070  yond that, the p
│ │ -00001b40: 6163 6b61 6765 2061 6c73 6f20 7368 6970  ackage also ship
│ │ -00001b50: 7320 6120 5b43 5544 4120 6465 7669 6365  s a [CUDA device

│ │ -00001bb0: 6720 7265 7365 6172 6368 6572 732e 2049  g researchers. I

│ │ -00002780: 204d 616e 6167 656d 656e 7420 4c69 6272   Management Libr

│ │ -000027f0: 6820 606c 6962 6e63 7572 7365 7377 6029  h `libncursesw`)
│ │ -00002800: 0a0a 2a2a 4e4f 5445 3a2a 2a20 5468 6520  ..**NOTE:** The 
│ │ -00002810: 5b4e 5649 4449 4120 4d61 6e61 6765 6d65  [NVIDIA Manageme

│ │ -000028b0: 6720 7661 7269 6f75 7320 7374 6174 6573  g various states
│ │ -000028c0: 2e20 5468 6520 7275 6e74 696d 6520 7665  . The runtime ve
│ │ -000028d0: 7273 696f 6e20 6f66 204e 564d 4c20 6c69  rsion of NVML li

│ │ -00003570: 6420 636f 6c6f 7269 7a65 642e 0a0a 6060  d colorized...``
│ │ -00003580: 6062 6173 680a 2320 5175 6572 7920 7374  `bash.# Query st
│ │ -00003590: 6174 7573 206f 6620 616c 6c20 6465 7669  atus of all devi

│ │ -000035d0: 0a0a 2320 5370 6563 6966 7920 7175 6572  ..# Specify quer
│ │ -000035e0: 7920 6465 7669 6365 7320 2862 7920 696e  y devices (by in
│ │ -000035f0: 7465 6765 7220 696e 6469 6365 7329 0a24  teger indices).$
│ │ -00003600: 206e 7669 746f 7020 2d31 202d 6f20 3020   nvitop -1 -o 0 
│ │ -00003610: 3120 2023 206f 6e6c 7920 7368 6f77 203c  1  # only show <
│ │ -00003620: 4750 5520 303e 2061 6e64 203c 4750 5520  GPU 0> and <GPU 
│ │ -00003630: 313e 0a0a 2320 4f6e 6c79 2073 686f 7720  1>..# Only show 
│ │ -00003640: 6465 7669 6365 7320 696e 2060 4355 4441  devices in `CUDA
│ │ -00003650: 5f56 4953 4942 4c45 5f44 4556 4943 4553  _VISIBLE_DEVICES
│ │ -00003660: 6020 2862 7920 696e 7465 6765 7220 696e  ` (by integer in
│ │ -00003670: 6469 6365 7320 6f72 2055 5549 4420 7374  dices or UUID st
│ │ -00003680: 7269 6e67 7329 0a24 206e 7669 746f 7020  rings).$ nvitop 
│ │ -00003690: 2d31 202d 6f76 0a0a 2320 4f6e 6c79 2073  -1 -ov..# Only s
│ │ -000036a0: 686f 7720 4750 5520 7072 6f63 6573 7365  how GPU processe
│ │ -000036b0: 7320 7769 7468 2074 6865 2063 6f6d 7075  s with the compu
│ │ -000036c0: 7465 2063 6f6e 7465 7874 2028 7479 7065  te context (type
│ │ -000036d0: 3a20 2743 2720 6f72 2027 432b 4727 290a  : 'C' or 'C+G').
│ │ -000036e0: 2420 6e76 6974 6f70 202d 3120 2d63 0a60  $ nvitop -1 -c.`
│ │ -000036f0: 6060 0a0a 5768 656e 2074 6865 2060 2d31  ``..When the `-1
│ │ -00003700: 6020 7377 6974 6368 2069 7320 6f6e 2c20  ` switch is on, 
│ │ -00003710: 7468 6520 7265 7375 6c74 2077 696c 6c20  the result will 
│ │ -00003720: 6265 2064 6973 706c 6179 6564 202a 2a4f  be displayed **O
│ │ -00003730: 4e4c 5920 4f4e 4345 2a2a 2028 7361 6d65  NLY ONCE** (same
│ │ -00003740: 2061 7320 7468 6520 6465 6661 756c 7420   as the default 
│ │ -00003750: 6265 6861 7669 6f72 206f 6620 606e 7669  behavior of `nvi
│ │ -00003760: 6469 612d 736d 6960 292e 2054 6869 7320  dia-smi`). This 
│ │ -00003770: 6973 206d 7563 6820 6661 7374 6572 2061  is much faster a
│ │ -00003780: 6e64 2068 6173 206c 6f77 6572 2072 6573  nd has lower res
│ │ -00003790: 6f75 7263 6520 7573 6167 652e 2053 6565  ource usage. See
│ │ -000037a0: 205b 436f 6d6d 616e 6420 4c69 6e65 204f   [Command Line O
│ │ -000037b0: 7074 696f 6e73 5d28 2363 6f6d 6d61 6e64  ptions](#command
│ │ -000037c0: 2d6c 696e 652d 6f70 7469 6f6e 732d 616e  -line-options-an
│ │ -000037d0: 642d 656e 7669 726f 6e6d 656e 742d 7661  d-environment-va
│ │ -000037e0: 7269 6162 6c65 7329 2066 6f72 206d 6f72  riables) for mor
│ │ -000037f0: 6520 636f 6d6d 616e 6420 6f70 7469 6f6e  e command option
│ │ -00003800: 732e 0a0a 5468 6572 6520 6973 2061 6c73  s...There is als
│ │ -00003810: 6f20 6120 434c 4920 746f 6f6c 2063 616c  o a CLI tool cal
│ │ -00003820: 6c65 6420 606e 7669 7365 6c60 2074 6861  led `nvisel` tha
│ │ -00003830: 7420 7368 6970 7320 7769 7468 2074 6865  t ships with the
│ │ -00003840: 2060 6e76 6974 6f70 6020 5079 5049 2070   `nvitop` PyPI p
│ │ -00003850: 6163 6b61 6765 2e20 5365 6520 5b43 5544  ackage. See [CUD
│ │ -00003860: 4120 5669 7369 626c 6520 4465 7669 6365  A Visible Device
│ │ -00003870: 7320 5365 6c65 6374 696f 6e20 546f 6f6c  s Selection Tool
│ │ -00003880: 5d28 2363 7564 612d 7669 7369 626c 652d  ](#cuda-visible-
│ │ -00003890: 6465 7669 6365 732d 7365 6c65 6374 696f  devices-selectio
│ │ -000038a0: 6e2d 746f 6f6c 2920 666f 7220 6d6f 7265  n-tool) for more
│ │ -000038b0: 2069 6e66 6f72 6d61 7469 6f6e 2e0a 0a23   information...#
│ │ -000038c0: 2323 2052 6573 6f75 7263 6520 4d6f 6e69  ## Resource Moni
│ │ -000038d0: 746f 720a 0a52 756e 2061 7320 6120 7265  tor..Run as a re
│ │ -000038e0: 736f 7572 6365 206d 6f6e 6974 6f72 3a0a  source monitor:.
│ │ -000038f0: 0a60 6060 6261 7368 0a23 204d 6f6e 6974  .```bash.# Monit
│ │ -00003900: 6f72 206d 6f64 6520 2877 6865 6e20 7468  or mode (when th
│ │ -00003910: 6520 6469 7370 6c61 7920 6d6f 6465 2069  e display mode i
│ │ -00003920: 7320 6f6d 6974 7465 642c 2060 4e56 4954  s omitted, `NVIT
│ │ -00003930: 4f50 5f4d 4f4e 4954 4f52 5f4d 4f44 4560  OP_MONITOR_MODE`

│ │ -00003980: 6963 616c 6c79 2063 6f6e 6669 6775 7265  ically configure
│ │ -00003990: 2074 6865 2064 6973 706c 6179 206d 6f64   the display mod
│ │ -000039a0: 6520 6163 636f 7264 696e 6720 746f 2074  e according to t

│ │ -00003f20: 7365 732e 0a0a 416c 736f 2c20 746f 2065  ses...Also, to e

│ │ +00001a00: 6976 6520 4e56 4944 4941 2064 6576 6963  ive NVIDIA devic
│ │ +00001a10: 6520 616e 6420 7072 6f63 6573 7320 6d6f  e and process mo

│ │ +00001a30: 7420 6861 7320 6120 636f 6c6f 7266 756c  t has a colorful
│ │ +00001a40: 2061 6e64 2069 6e66 6f72 6d61 7469 7665   and informative
│ │ +00001a50: 2069 6e74 6572 6661 6365 2074 6861 7420   interface that

│ │ +00001a70: 6174 6573 2074 6865 2073 7461 7475 7320  ates the status 
│ │ +00001a80: 6f66 2074 6865 2064 6576 6963 6573 2061  of the devices a
│ │ +00001a90: 6e64 2070 726f 6365 7373 6573 2e20 4173  nd processes. As
│ │ +00001aa0: 2061 2072 6573 6f75 7263 6520 6d6f 6e69   a resource moni

│ │ +00001ae0: 2061 7320 7472 6565 2d76 6965 772c 2065   as tree-view, e

│ │ +00001b20: 7072 6f63 6573 7320 6d65 7472 6963 7320  process metrics

│ │ +00001b40: 2042 6579 6f6e 6420 7468 6174 2c20 7468   Beyond that, th
│ │ +00001b50: 6520 7061 636b 6167 6520 616c 736f 2073  e package also s
│ │ +00001b60: 6869 7073 2061 205b 4355 4441 2064 6576  hips a [CUDA dev
│ │ +00001b70: 6963 6520 7365 6c65 6374 696f 6e20 746f  ice selection to

│ │ +00001be0: 6573 2068 616e 6479 2041 5049 7320 7468  es handy APIs th
│ │ +00001bf0: 6174 2061 6c6c 6f77 2064 6576 656c 6f70  at allow develop
│ │ +00001c00: 6572 7320 746f 2077 7269 7465 2074 6865  ers to write the
│ │ +00001c10: 6972 206f 776e 206d 6f6e 6974 6f72 696e  ir own monitorin
│ │ +00001c20: 6720 746f 6f6c 732e 2050 6c65 6173 6520  g tools. Please 
│ │ +00001c30: 7265 6665 7220 746f 2073 6563 7469 6f6e  refer to section
│ │ +00001c40: 205b 4d6f 7265 2074 6861 6e20 6120 4d6f   [More than a Mo
│ │ +00001c50: 6e69 746f 725d 2823 6d6f 7265 2d74 6861  nitor](#more-tha
│ │ +00001c60: 6e2d 612d 6d6f 6e69 746f 7229 2061 6e64  n-a-monitor) and
│ │ +00001c70: 2074 6865 2066 756c 6c20 4150 4920 7265   the full API re
│ │ +00001c80: 6665 7265 6e63 6573 2061 7420 3c68 7474  ferences at <htt
│ │ +00001c90: 7073 3a2f 2f6e 7669 746f 702e 7265 6164  ps://nvitop.read
│ │ +00001ca0: 7468 6564 6f63 732e 696f 3e20 666f 7220  thedocs.io> for 
│ │ +00001cb0: 6d6f 7265 2069 6e66 6f72 6d61 7469 6f6e  more information
│ │ +00001cc0: 2e0a 0a3c 7020 616c 6967 6e3d 2263 656e  ...<p align="cen
│ │ +00001cd0: 7465 7222 3e0a 2020 3c69 6d67 2077 6964  ter">.  <img wid
│ │ +00001ce0: 7468 3d22 3130 3025 2220 7372 633d 2268  th="100%" src="h
│ │ +00001cf0: 7474 7073 3a2f 2f75 7365 722d 696d 6167  ttps://user-imag
│ │ +00001d00: 6573 2e67 6974 6875 6275 7365 7263 6f6e  es.githubusercon
│ │ +00001d10: 7465 6e74 2e63 6f6d 2f31 3630 3738 3333  tent.com/1607833

│ │ +00001d50: 2e70 6e67 2220 616c 743d 2246 696c 7465  .png" alt="Filte
│ │ +00001d60: 7222 3e0a 2020 3c62 722f 3e0a 2020 5072  r">.  <br/>.  Pr

│ │ +00001e30: 2e70 6e67 2220 616c 743d 2243 6f6d 7061  .png" alt="Compa
│ │ +00001e40: 7269 736f 6e22 3e0a 2020 3c62 722f 3e0a  rison">.  <br/>.
│ │ +00001e50: 2020 436f 6d70 6172 6520 746f 203c 636f    Compare to <co
│ │ +00001e60: 6465 3e6e 7669 6469 612d 736d 693c 2f63  de>nvidia-smi</c
│ │ +00001e70: 6f64 653e 2e0a 3c2f 703e 0a0a 2d2d 2d2d  ode>..</p>..----
│ │ +00001e80: 2d2d 0a0a 2323 2046 6561 7475 7265 730a  --..## Features.
│ │ +00001e90: 0a2d 202a 2a49 6e66 6f72 6d61 7469 7665  .- **Informative
│ │ +00001ea0: 2061 6e64 2066 616e 6379 206f 7574 7075   and fancy outpu
│ │ +00001eb0: 742a 2a3a 2073 686f 7720 6d6f 7265 2069  t**: show more i
│ │ +00001ec0: 6e66 6f72 6d61 7469 6f6e 2074 6861 6e20  nformation than 
│ │ +00001ed0: 606e 7669 6469 612d 736d 6960 2077 6974  `nvidia-smi` wit
│ │ +00001ee0: 6820 636f 6c6f 7269 7a65 6420 6661 6e63  h colorized fanc
│ │ +00001ef0: 7920 626f 7820 6472 6177 696e 672e 0a2d  y box drawing..-
│ │ +00001f00: 202a 2a4d 6f6e 6974 6f72 206d 6f64 652a   **Monitor mode*
│ │ +00001f10: 2a3a 2063 616e 2072 756e 2061 7320 6120  *: can run as a 
│ │ +00001f20: 7265 736f 7572 6365 206d 6f6e 6974 6f72  resource monitor
│ │ +00001f30: 2c20 7261 7468 6572 2074 6861 6e20 7072  , rather than pr
│ │ +00001f40: 696e 7420 7468 6520 7265 7375 6c74 7320  int the results 
│ │ +00001f50: 6f6e 6c79 206f 6e63 652e 0a20 202d 2062  only once..  - b
│ │ +00001f60: 6172 2063 6861 7274 7320 616e 6420 6869  ar charts and hi
│ │ +00001f70: 7374 6f72 7920 6772 6170 6873 0a20 202d  story graphs.  -
│ │ +00001f80: 2070 726f 6365 7373 2073 6f72 7469 6e67   process sorting
│ │ +00001f90: 0a20 202d 2070 726f 6365 7373 2066 696c  .  - process fil
│ │ +00001fa0: 7465 7269 6e67 0a20 202d 2073 656e 6420  tering.  - send 
│ │ +00001fb0: 7369 676e 616c 7320 746f 2070 726f 6365  signals to proce
│ │ +00001fc0: 7373 6573 2077 6974 6820 6120 6b65 7973  sses with a keys
│ │ +00001fd0: 7472 6f6b 650a 2020 2d20 7472 6565 2d76  troke.  - tree-v
│ │ +00001fe0: 6965 7720 7363 7265 656e 2066 6f72 2047  iew screen for G
│ │ +00001ff0: 5055 2070 726f 6365 7373 6573 2061 6e64  PU processes and
│ │ +00002000: 2074 6865 6972 2070 6172 656e 7420 7072   their parent pr
│ │ +00002010: 6f63 6573 7365 730a 2020 2d20 656e 7669  ocesses.  - envi
│ │ +00002020: 726f 6e6d 656e 7420 7661 7269 6162 6c65  ronment variable
│ │ +00002030: 2073 6372 6565 6e0a 2020 2d20 6865 6c70   screen.  - help
│ │ +00002040: 2073 6372 6565 6e0a 2020 2d20 6d6f 7573   screen.  - mous
│ │ +00002050: 6520 7375 7070 6f72 740a 2d20 2a2a 496e  e support.- **In
│ │ +00002060: 7465 7261 6374 6976 652a 2a3a 2072 6573  teractive**: res
│ │ +00002070: 706f 6e73 6976 6520 666f 7220 7573 6572  ponsive for user
│ │ +00002080: 2069 6e70 7574 2028 6672 6f6d 206b 6579   input (from key
│ │ +00002090: 626f 6172 6420 616e 642f 6f72 206d 6f75  board and/or mou
│ │ +000020a0: 7365 2920 696e 206d 6f6e 6974 6f72 206d  se) in monitor m
│ │ +000020b0: 6f64 652e 2028 7673 2e20 5b67 7075 7374  ode. (vs. [gpust
│ │ +000020c0: 6174 5d28 6874 7470 733a 2f2f 6769 7468  at](https://gith
│ │ +000020d0: 7562 2e63 6f6d 2f77 6f6f 6b61 7969 6e2f  ub.com/wookayin/
│ │ +000020e0: 6770 7573 7461 7429 2026 205b 7079 336e  gpustat) & [py3n
│ │ +000020f0: 766d 6c5d 2868 7474 7073 3a2f 2f67 6974  vml](https://git
│ │ +00002100: 6875 622e 636f 6d2f 6662 636f 7474 6572  hub.com/fbcotter
│ │ +00002110: 2f70 7933 6e76 6d6c 2929 0a2d 202a 2a45  /py3nvml)).- **E
│ │ +00002120: 6666 6963 6965 6e74 2a2a 3a0a 2020 2d20  fficient**:.  - 
│ │ +00002130: 7175 6572 7920 6465 7669 6365 2073 7461  query device sta
│ │ +00002140: 7475 7320 7573 696e 6720 5b2a 4e56 4d4c  tus using [*NVML
│ │ +00002150: 2050 7974 686f 6e20 6269 6e64 696e 6773   Python bindings
│ │ +00002160: 2a5d 2868 7474 7073 3a2f 2f70 7970 692e  *](https://pypi.
│ │ +00002170: 6f72 672f 7072 6f6a 6563 742f 6e76 6964  org/project/nvid
│ │ +00002180: 6961 2d6d 6c2d 7079 2920 6469 7265 6374  ia-ml-py) direct
│ │ +00002190: 6c79 2c20 696e 7374 6561 6420 6f66 2070  ly, instead of p
│ │ +000021a0: 6172 7369 6e67 2074 6865 206f 7574 7075  arsing the outpu
│ │ +000021b0: 7420 6f66 2060 6e76 6964 6961 2d73 6d69  t of `nvidia-smi
│ │ +000021c0: 602e 2028 7673 2e20 5b6e 7669 6469 612d  `. (vs. [nvidia-
│ │ +000021d0: 6874 6f70 5d28 6874 7470 733a 2f2f 6769  htop](https://gi
│ │ +000021e0: 7468 7562 2e63 6f6d 2f70 6563 6931 2f6e  thub.com/peci1/n
│ │ +000021f0: 7669 6469 612d 6874 6f70 2929 0a20 202d  vidia-htop)).  -
│ │ +00002200: 2073 7570 706f 7274 2073 7061 7273 6520   support sparse 
│ │ +00002210: 7175 6572 7920 616e 6420 6361 6368 6520  query and cache 
│ │ +00002220: 7265 7375 6c74 7320 7769 7468 2060 5454  results with `TT
│ │ +00002230: 4c43 6163 6865 6020 6672 6f6d 205b 6361  LCache` from [ca
│ │ +00002240: 6368 6574 6f6f 6c73 5d28 6874 7470 733a  chetools](https:
│ │ +00002250: 2f2f 6769 7468 7562 2e63 6f6d 2f74 6b65  //github.com/tke

│ │ +00002270: 7673 2e20 5b67 7075 7374 6174 5d28 6874  vs. [gpustat](ht
│ │ +00002280: 7470 733a 2f2f 6769 7468 7562 2e63 6f6d  tps://github.com

│ │ +000022a0: 7429 290a 2020 2d20 6469 7370 6c61 7920  t)).  - display 
│ │ +000022b0: 696e 666f 726d 6174 696f 6e20 7573 696e  information usin
│ │ +000022c0: 6720 7468 6520 6063 7572 7365 7360 206c  g the `curses` l
│ │ +000022d0: 6962 7261 7279 2072 6174 6865 7220 7468  ibrary rather th

│ │ +00002300: 732e 2028 7673 2e20 5b70 7933 6e76 6d6c  s. (vs. [py3nvml

│ │ +00002340: 6368 726f 6e6f 7573 6c79 2067 6174 6865  chronously gathe
│ │ +00002350: 7220 696e 666f 726d 6174 696f 6e20 7573  r information us
│ │ +00002360: 696e 6720 6d75 6c74 692d 7468 7265 6164  ing multi-thread
│ │ +00002370: 696e 6720 616e 6420 636f 7272 6573 706f  ing and correspo
│ │ +00002380: 6e64 2074 6f20 7573 6572 2069 6e70 7574  nd to user input
│ │ +00002390: 206d 7563 6820 6661 7374 6572 2e20 2876   much faster. (v
│ │ +000023a0: 732e 205b 6e76 746f 705d 2868 7474 7073  s. [nvtop](https
│ │ +000023b0: 3a2f 2f67 6974 6875 622e 636f 6d2f 5379  ://github.com/Sy
│ │ +000023c0: 6c6c 6f2f 6e76 746f 7029 290a 2d20 2a2a  llo/nvtop)).- **
│ │ +000023d0: 506f 7274 6162 6c65 2a2a 3a20 776f 726b  Portable**: work
│ │ +000023e0: 206f 6e20 626f 7468 204c 696e 7578 2061   on both Linux a
│ │ +000023f0: 6e64 2057 696e 646f 7773 2e0a 2020 2d20  nd Windows..  - 
│ │ +00002400: 6765 7420 686f 7374 2070 726f 6365 7373  get host process
│ │ +00002410: 2069 6e66 6f72 6d61 7469 6f6e 2075 7369   information usi
│ │ +00002420: 6e67 2074 6865 2063 726f 7373 2d70 6c61  ng the cross-pla
│ │ +00002430: 7466 6f72 6d20 6c69 6272 6172 7920 5b70  tform library [p

│ │ +000024f0: 622e 636f 6d2f 6662 636f 7474 6572 2f70  b.com/fbcotter/p

│ │ +00002510: 7474 656e 2069 6e20 7075 7265 2050 7974  tten in pure Pyt
│ │ +00002520: 686f 6e2c 2065 6173 7920 746f 2069 6e73  hon, easy to ins
│ │ +00002530: 7461 6c6c 2077 6974 6820 6070 6970 602e  tall with `pip`.
│ │ +00002540: 2028 7673 2e20 5b6e 7674 6f70 5d28 6874   (vs. [nvtop](ht

│ │ +00002560: 2f53 796c 6c6f 2f6e 7674 6f70 2929 0a2d  /Syllo/nvtop)).-
│ │ +00002570: 202a 2a49 6e74 6567 7261 626c 652a 2a3a   **Integrable**:
│ │ +00002580: 2065 6173 7920 746f 2069 6e74 6567 7261   easy to integra
│ │ +00002590: 7465 2069 6e74 6f20 6f74 6865 7220 6170  te into other ap
│ │ +000025a0: 706c 6963 6174 696f 6e73 2c20 6d6f 7265  plications, more
│ │ +000025b0: 2074 6861 6e20 6d6f 6e69 746f 7269 6e67   than monitoring
│ │ +000025c0: 2e20 2876 732e 205b 6e76 6964 6961 2d68  . (vs. [nvidia-h

│ │ +00002770: 6571 7569 7265 6d65 6e74 730a 0a2d 2050  equirements..- P
│ │ +00002780: 7974 686f 6e20 332e 372b 0a2d 204e 5649  ython 3.7+.- NVI
│ │ +00002790: 4449 4120 4d61 6e61 6765 6d65 6e74 204c  DIA Management L
│ │ +000027a0: 6962 7261 7279 2028 4e56 4d4c 290a 2d20  ibrary (NVML).- 
│ │ +000027b0: 6e76 6964 6961 2d6d 6c2d 7079 0a2d 2070  nvidia-ml-py.- p
│ │ +000027c0: 7375 7469 6c0a 2d20 6361 6368 6574 6f6f  sutil.- cachetoo
│ │ +000027d0: 6c73 0a2d 2074 6572 6d63 6f6c 6f72 0a2d  ls.- termcolor.-
│ │ +000027e0: 2063 7572 7365 733c 7375 703e 5b2a 5d28   curses<sup>[*](
│ │ +000027f0: 2363 7572 7365 7329 3c2f 7375 703e 2028  #curses)</sup> (
│ │ +00002800: 7769 7468 2060 6c69 626e 6375 7273 6573  with `libncurses
│ │ +00002810: 7760 290a 0a2a 2a4e 4f54 453a 2a2a 2054  w`)..**NOTE:** T
│ │ +00002820: 6865 205b 4e56 4944 4941 204d 616e 6167  he [NVIDIA Manag
│ │ +00002830: 656d 656e 7420 4c69 6272 6172 7920 282a  ement Library (*
│ │ +00002840: 4e56 4d4c 2a29 5d28 6874 7470 733a 2f2f  NVML*)](https://
│ │ +00002850: 6465 7665 6c6f 7065 722e 6e76 6964 6961  developer.nvidia
│ │ +00002860: 2e63 6f6d 2f6e 7669 6469 612d 6d61 6e61  .com/nvidia-mana
│ │ +00002870: 6765 6d65 6e74 2d6c 6962 7261 7279 2d6e  gement-library-n
│ │ +00002880: 766d 6c29 2069 7320 6120 432d 6261 7365  vml) is a C-base
│ │ +00002890: 6420 7072 6f67 7261 6d6d 6174 6963 2069  d programmatic i
│ │ +000028a0: 6e74 6572 6661 6365 2066 6f72 206d 6f6e  nterface for mon
│ │ +000028b0: 6974 6f72 696e 6720 616e 6420 6d61 6e61  itoring and mana
│ │ +000028c0: 6769 6e67 2076 6172 696f 7573 2073 7461  ging various sta
│ │ +000028d0: 7465 732e 2054 6865 2072 756e 7469 6d65  tes. The runtime
│ │ +000028e0: 2076 6572 7369 6f6e 206f 6620 4e56 4d4c   version of NVML
│ │ +000028f0: 206c 6962 7261 7279 2073 6869 7073 2077   library ships w
│ │ +00002900: 6974 6820 7468 6520 4e56 4944 4941 2064  ith the NVIDIA d
│ │ +00002910: 6973 706c 6179 2064 7269 7665 7220 2861  isplay driver (a
│ │ +00002920: 7661 696c 6162 6c65 2061 7420 5b44 6f77  vailable at [Dow
│ │ +00002930: 6e6c 6f61 6420 4472 6976 6572 7320 7c20  nload Drivers | 
│ │ +00002940: 4e56 4944 4941 5d28 6874 7470 733a 2f2f  NVIDIA](https://
│ │ +00002950: 7777 772e 6e76 6964 6961 2e63 6f6d 2f44  www.nvidia.com/D
│ │ +00002960: 6f77 6e6c 6f61 642f 696e 6465 782e 6173  ownload/index.as
│ │ +00002970: 7078 2929 2c20 6f72 2063 616e 2062 6520  px)), or can be 
│ │ +00002980: 646f 776e 6c6f 6164 6564 2061 7320 7061  downloaded as pa
│ │ +00002990: 7274 206f 6620 7468 6520 4e56 4944 4941  rt of the NVIDIA
│ │ +000029a0: 2043 5544 4120 546f 6f6c 6b69 7420 2861   CUDA Toolkit (a
│ │ +000029b0: 7661 696c 6162 6c65 2061 7420 5b43 5544  vailable at [CUD
│ │ +000029c0: 4120 546f 6f6c 6b69 7420 7c20 4e56 4944  A Toolkit | NVID
│ │ +000029d0: 4941 2044 6576 656c 6f70 6572 5d28 6874  IA Developer](ht
│ │ +000029e0: 7470 733a 2f2f 6465 7665 6c6f 7065 722e  tps://developer.
│ │ +000029f0: 6e76 6964 6961 2e63 6f6d 2f63 7564 612d  nvidia.com/cuda-
│ │ +00002a00: 646f 776e 6c6f 6164 7329 292e 2054 6865  downloads)). The
│ │ +00002a10: 206c 6973 7473 206f 6620 4f53 2070 6c61   lists of OS pla
│ │ +00002a20: 7466 6f72 6d73 2061 6e64 204e 5649 4449  tforms and NVIDI
│ │ +00002a30: 412d 4750 5573 2073 7570 706f 7274 6564  A-GPUs supported
│ │ +00002a40: 2062 7920 7468 6520 4e56 4d4c 206c 6962   by the NVML lib
│ │ +00002a50: 7261 7279 2063 616e 2062 6520 666f 756e  rary can be foun
│ │ +00002a60: 6420 696e 2074 6865 205b 4e56 4d4c 2041  d in the [NVML A
│ │ +00002a70: 5049 2052 6566 6572 656e 6365 5d28 6874  PI Reference](ht
│ │ +00002a80: 7470 733a 2f2f 646f 6373 2e6e 7669 6469  tps://docs.nvidi

│ │ +00002ab0: 6566 6572 656e 6365 2e68 746d 6c29 2e0a  eference.html)..
│ │ +00002ac0: 0a54 6869 7320 7265 706f 7369 746f 7279  .This repository
│ │ +00002ad0: 2063 6f6e 7461 696e 7320 6120 4261 7368   contains a Bash

│ │ +00002b20: 466f 7220 6578 616d 706c 653a 0a0a 6060  For example:..``

│ │ +00002e50: 6272 6172 7920 6973 2061 2062 7569 6c74  brary is a built

│ │ +00002e80: 6520 7379 7374 656d 732c 2061 6e64 2069  e systems, and i
│ │ +00002e90: 7420 6973 2073 7570 706f 7274 6564 2062  t is supported b
│ │ +00002ea0: 7920 6120 7468 6972 642d 7061 7274 7920  y a third-party 
│ │ +00002eb0: 7061 636b 6167 6520 6361 6c6c 6564 2060  package called `
│ │ +00002ec0: 7769 6e64 6f77 732d 6375 7273 6573 6020  windows-curses` 
│ │ +00002ed0: 6f6e 2057 696e 646f 7773 2075 7369 6e67  on Windows using
│ │ +00002ee0: 2050 4443 7572 7365 732e 2049 6e63 6f6e   PDCurses. Incon
│ │ +00002ef0: 7369 7374 656e 7420 6265 6861 7669 6f72  sistent behavior
│ │ +00002f00: 206f 6620 606e 7669 746f 7060 206d 6179   of `nvitop` may

│ │ +00002f60: 2e0a 0a2d 2d2d 2d2d 2d0a 0a23 2320 496e  ...------..## In
